full_text:
**LATEST UPDATE**: This *used to be* a scratch pad that anyone can edit. However,
with the [latest site update][lsu], only a document's creator may edit it. However, you can
make a "Copy" of the scratch pad for yourself and edit away. Just don't publish it, that's all :)
[lsu]: http://blog.patantara.com/blog/2014/07/28/creating-slash-editing-notations-on-patantara-is-now-open-to-all/
**NOTE**: This is a general scratch pad for people to try out the Carnot Wiki.
Documents are saved automatically and there is no "save" button you have to click.
At the moment, you do need a live internet connection.
> This is great! Give us another one. You should turn professional.
> -- Rowan Atkinson
"Nāsikā:bhūṣaṇi"

# 2. Varṇam
##"Svāmi nān unṛan aḍimai"
*Rāgam:* Nāṭṭakuriñji
*Tālam:* Ādi
*Compōser:* Pāpanāsa sivan
## Lyrics
*Pallavi:*  Svāmi nān unṛan aḍimai enṛu ulagamellām aṛiyumē
tāmadam seyyādu vandaruḷ mādōr paṅgā būdēsā
*Anupallavi:*  nāmāmr̥da pānamē en jīvanamē enṛu nambinēnē
naṭanamāḍum sēvaḍi darisanamenru kiḍaikkumenavē ēṅginēnē
*Muktāyi svara:* ceñjaḍā ḍaviyil iḷampirai deiva kaṅgaiyum ōraravumāḍa
iḷanagai  tavazuñ sevvidazuḍan tadīm ena ciṭrambaḷan tanilāḍum
*Caraṇa:* naṭarājā dēvā saccidā ānanda
*Caraṇa svara sāhitya 1:* āḍum nin azagil kādal koṇḍa ivaḷaippār
*Caraṇa svara sāhitya 2:* nandi bṛṅgi siva ghaṇam munivaṛgalum indiran mudalamara kōṭikaḷ paṇiyum
*Caraṇa svara sāhitya 3:* puṇnakait tavaz idazin azagaiyum kadaik kaṇnazakaiyum kaṇdāl mazuppaḍaiyai
ceñjaḍaiyai tōluḍaiyai madakaja naḍaiyai ninaindurugum ivaḷai āṇḍarul
*Caraṇa svara sāhitya 4:* nī varantara uḍan virainḍ va meiyanbu koṇḍu ninaindu nāḷ muzudum tan ninaivilāḷ kaṇ uraṅgilaḷ uṇavar̥ndilaḷ
tiruppeyarai sollisollipulambuvaḷ tanimaitanilē kalakalavena nakaittiḍumivaḷin viragam taṇiya aruḷ nī puriyāviḍilē mōsam varum pāsamuḍan vantaruḷ

name: 21st hindolam
full_text:
#Tiruppugaḻ : kāvippuvai
#Rāga : Hindōḷam
#Tāḷa  : Khaṇḍa Rūpakam
---
##Kāvip pūvai yēvai yikalavaṉa
##nīlath thāla kāla nikarvaṉa
##kāthip pōka mōka maruḷvaṉa  -  iruthōṭār
</br>
##Kāthiṟ kāthi mōthi yuḻalkaṇa
##māyath thārkaḷ thēka parisaṉa
##kāmak rōtha lōpa mathamivai - sithaiyātha
</br>
##Pāvik kāyu vāyu valamvara
##lālip pārkaḷ pōtha karumavu
##pāyath thāṉa ñāṉa neṛithaṉai - yiṉimēlaṉ
</br>
##Pālek kāka yōka jepathapa
##nēsith thāra vāra paripura
##pāthath thāḷu māṟu thiruvuḷa - niṉaiyāthō
</br>
##Kūvik kōḻi vāḻi yeṉamayi
##lālith thāla kāla meṉavuyar
##kūḷic chēṉai vāṉa misaithaṉil - viḷaiyāḍak
</br>
##Kōrath thīra cūra ṉuḍaiviṉai
##pāṟac chīṟa lēṉa pathithaṉai
##kōlak kāla māka amarceytha - vaḍivēlā
</br>
##Āvic chēlkaḷ pūka maḍaliḷa
##pāḷaith thāṟu kūṟu paḍavuya
##rālaic chōlai mēlai vayaliyi - luṟaivōṉē
</br>
##Āsaith thōkai mārka ḷisaiyuḍa
##ṉāḍip pāḍi nāḍi varuthiru
##āṉaik kāvil mēvi yaruḷiya - perumāḷē
</br>

## Ā Dinamuninci
Rāgam: *Ānandabhairavi*
Tāḷam : *Tripuṭa*
Composer : *Śyāmā Sastry*
Notation from "Compositions of Śyāma Śāstry" by T.K.Govinda rao
Notated by - Swathi Renganath
##Lyrics
Pallavi: Ā dinamuninci pogaḍi pogaḍi
āṣrayinci nī mahimalanu pāḍa lēdā
Anupallavi: Ādi śakti nīvani namminānu nammina nannu
ādarinca lēvā daya lēdā
Caraṇa: Ahi bhūṣaṇuni rāṇī purāṇī bhavānī
ali kula vēṇī āṣṛta śrēṇī ambuja lōcanī
śyāma kṛṣṇa pālita jananī akhila lōka pāvanī
śyāmaḷāmbikē varadē abhaya dānamīyavē

full_text:
#Aadal Nāyagan
###Rāgam : Kalyāni
###Tāḷam : Ādi
---------
</br>
###Pallavi:
#### ādal nāyagaṉ ādiṉaṉ ambalam tannil āṉanda thāṇḍavam ādiyavar paṇindhidum natarajaṉ
#### ūdal koṇda kāḷiyiṉ garvam taṉai kaḷaiya ūrthava thāṇḍavam āḍiya nādaṉ
</br>
###Anupallavi:
####koodal nagar thaṉṉil kumudamā malar muga kōmala kavin migu madhumaiyai maṇarnthāṉ
####vādal nigar koṇdu vadivazhagai kāṇa nadal koḷḷum adiyarai kākka
</br>
###Muktayi Svara-Sahitya:
####ādhi antham illādha nāyaga jyotiyāṉa senchudaroḷiyē
####pāriṉil nith̄am paṇirndhidave pādāram thaṉil niṉaithudaṉe kaṇindudaṉe vā
####sarvēsha shivā unadazhagil eṉai marandheṉ paramporule
</br>
###Charanam:
####umā maheshwarā udaṉ vandharuḷvāi ulagiṉil uruthuṇai neeye
</br>
###Chittai Svara-Sahitya:
####1) sangam muzhangidave santhatham ādidum sankarā
####2) viṇṇai nigartha puruvam neḷindhādave mullai sirippil thuyaram parandhōdave thillai pathikkuḷ avaṉum nadamāda
####3) thingaḷai sodiya shankaraṉe angamadhil saripadhiyai mangai magizha thantha sarveshwara
#### nagakangaṇamum orugangaiyayum siramaṇinthavaṉe
-------
###Pallavi

full_text:
#ஆடல் நாயகன்
###ராகம் : கல்யாணி
###தாளம் : ஆதி
---------
</br>
###பல்லவி:
#### ஆடல் நாயகன் ஆடினான் அம்பலம் தன்னில் ஆனந்த தாண்டவம் அடியவர் பணிந்திடும் நடராஜன்
#### ஊடல் கொண்ட காளியின் கர்வம் தனை களைய ஊர்தவ தாண்டவம் ஆடிய நாதன்
</br>
###அனுபல்லவி:
####கூடல் நகர் தன்னில் குமுத மாமலர் முக கோமள கவின் மிகு மாதுமையை மணர்ந்தான்
####வாடல் மிக கொண்டு வடிவழகை காண நாடல் கொள்ளும் அடியரை காக்க
</br>
###முக்தாயி ஸ்வர-ஸாஹித்யம்:
####ஆதி அந்தம் இல்லாத நாயகா ஜோதியான செஞ்சுடரொளியே
####பாரினில் நிதம் பணிந்திடவே உன் பாதாரம் தநை நினைந்துடனே கனிந்துடனே வா
####ஸர்வேஷா சிவா உனதழகில் எனை மறந்தென் பரம்பொருளே
</br>
###சரனம்:
####உமா மஹெஷ்வரா உடன் வந்தருள்வாய் உலகினில் உருதுணை நீயே
</br>
###சிட்டை ஸ்வர-ஸாஹித்யம்:
####1) சங்கம் முழங்கிடவே சந்ததம் ஆடிடும் சங்கரா
####2) விண்ணை நிகர்த்த புருவம் நெளிந்தாடவே முல்லை சிரிப்பில் துயரம் பரந்தோடவே தில்லை பதிக்குள் அவனும் நடமாட
####3) திங்களை சூடிய சங்கரனே அங்கமதில் சரிபாதியை மங்கை மகிழ தந்த சர்வேஷ்வரா நாககங்கணமும் ஒரு கங்கையயும்  சிரமணிந்தவநே
-------

## Akhilāndeśwarī (Movie: Saptapadi)
*rāgam:*  rāgamālikā
*tāḷam:* ādi
## Lyrics
*pallavi:*  akhilāndeśwarī cāmuṇdeśwarī pālayamām gaurī paripālayamām gaurī
*anupallavi:* ṣubhagātri girirāja putrī
abhinetri sarvārdha gātri
sarvārdha śandhātri jagadekha janaitrī
candraprabhā dhavala kīrtī
caturbāhu samrakṣita sīkṣita chaturdaśāntara bhuvana pālinī
kumkuma rāga śōbhinī kusuma bāṇa samśōbhinī
mouna suhāsinī gāna vinodinī
bhagavati pārvati devi
*caranam 1:*  śrī hari praṇayāmburāsī
śrī pāda vicalita kṣīrāmburāsī
śrī pītha samvardhinī dōlāsura mardhinī
dhana lakṣmī dhānya lakṣmī dhairya lakṣmī vijaya lakṣmī
ādi lakṣmī vidyā lakṣmī gaja lakṣmī santāna lakṣmī
sakala bhoga soubhāgyalakṣmī
śrī mahālakṣmī devī
*caranam 2:* indu vadane kunda radane vīṇa pustaka dhārine
śuka śaunakādi vyāsa vālmīki munijana pūjita shubha charaṇe
sarasa sāhitya swarasa sangīta stana yugalē
varade akṣara rūpinē śāradē devī
*caranam 3:* vindhyāta nīvāsinē
yoga sanjāḥ samudbhāṣinē
simhāsana sthāyine dushtahara ramhakriyā sālinē
viṣnupriyē sarvaloka priyē
sarvanāmapriyē dharma samara priyē
hey brahmacāriṇē duṣkarmavāriṇē
hey vilambita keśa pāsinē
mahiṣa mardhanaśīla mahita gharjanalola
bhayada nartana kelikē kālikē
durgamāgamadurga vāsinē
durgē devīm

# Alankarams *Pāt̤āntaram:* Dr. Karaikudi S. Subramanian Basic traditional scalar exercises for various time structures in Carnatic music. With all play the 1st speed once, the 2nd speed twice and 3rd speed 4 times. 
stretch = 1.25
stretch space = 0.75

# Amba Kāmākṣi
*Rāgam:* Bhairavi
*Composer:* Śyāmā Śāstri
*Tāḷam:* Miśra Cāpu
tala pattern = ,
stretch = 0.5
> Ārōhaṇam
S R g m P D n S+
> Avarōhaṇam
S+ n d P m g R S
## Lyrics
TODO: Check transliterations
[kāmākṣi  ambā anudinamumaravakanē](#lyrics)
[nī pādamule dikkanucu nammitini](#lyrics)
[śrī kañci kāmākṣi](#lyrics)
[kundaradanā  kuvalaya nayanā  talli rakṣiñcu](#lyrics)
[kambugaḷa nīrada cikurā vidhuvadanā māyamma](#lyrics)
[kumbhakuca madamatta gajagama padma bhava hari   śambhu nuta pada](#lyrics)
[śaṁkarī nīvu nā cintala  vē vēga dīrccammā yipuḍu ](#lyrics)
[bhakta jana kalpa latikā karuṇālayā sadayā giri tanaya](#lyrics)
[kāvavē śaraṇāgatuḍugada tāmasamu sēyaka vara mosagu](#lyrics)
[pātakamulanu dīrcci  nī pada bhakti sampada mīyavē](#lyrics)
[pāvanigadā moravinadā parākēlanammā vinamma](#lyrics)
[kaluṣahāriṇi sadā nata phala dāyakiyani birudu bhuvilō](#lyrics)
[galigina dorayanucu vēdamu moraliḍa kavini](#lyrics)
[nī pavana  nilayā surasamu dayākara vidhrta kuvalayā mada](#lyrics)
[danuja vāraṇa mr̥gēndrārccita kaluśa dahana ghanā](#lyrics)
[aparimita vaibhavamugala nī smaraṇa madilō dalacina janādulaku](#lyrics)
[bahu sampadala niccēvipuḍumākabhaya miyya vē](#lyrics)
[śyāma kr̥ṣṇa sahōdari śiva śaṁkari paramēśvari ](#lyrics)
[hariharādulaku nī mahimalu gaṇimpa taramā sutuḍammā](#lyrics)
[abhimānamulēdā  nāpai](#lyrics)
[dēvī parākēlanē  brōvavē yipuḍu śrī bhairavi](#lyrics)
## Meaning
Oh Pārvati, Mother! Bhavāni! Śrī Rājarājēśvari, the nourisher of all the worlds!
The esteemed Dēvi! The lotus eyed, Pāvani! Kāmākṣi! The blemishless one! Protect me, Ambā!
You are the bestower of good fortune, Mother Mṛḍāni, of the supreme suzerain!
You are of the form of the mystic syllable "Hrīm". Your eyes are like a doe. Oh Dēvī, who
dwells in Kāñcīpura, Kāmākṣi, Śrī  Kāmēśvari,  protect me  Ambā!
You are Śāmbhavi, Janani, the ancient one, Śrī Rājarājēśvari, you are adorned with moon.
Śaṁkari Dēvi the nourisher of Śyāmakṛṣṇa. Kāmākṣi! The dark hued godess, protect me Ambā!

##Ānandēśvarēṇa
*Rāgam* : Ānandabhairavi
*Tāḷam:*  Miśra jti ēka tāḷaṁ
*Composer:* Muttusvāmy Dīkṣitar
Notation From "Saṅgīta sampradāya pradarṣini" by Subbarāma dīkṣitar
Notated by Swathi Renganath
### Ārōhaṇam -     S G1 G1 M1 P D1 P S N2 S
### Avarōhaṇam -   S N2 D1 P M1 M1 M1 G1 G1 R2 S
##Lyrics
###Pallavi
Ānandēśvare̱ṇa saṁrakṣitōhaṁ
cidānanda rūpōsmi brahmānanda rūpōsmi
###Anupallavi
jnāna pradāna guru guha rūpa-
cidānanda nātha sva-rūpa prakāśēna
###Caraṇaṁ
avayava trayātItēna nityēna
avasthā traya sākshiṇāti śuddhēna
bhava panca kōśa vyatiriktēna buddhēna
śiva saccidānanda rūpēṇa muktēna
###Madhyamakalaṁ
śravaṇa manana nididhyāsana samādhi
niṣthāparōkshānubhava sva-mātrāvaśēṣita-
prakāśamāna mahēśvarēṇa

name: Anandabhairavi- Kamalamba samrakshathumam
full_text:
## Kamalāmba Samrakṣitōham
*Rāgam* : Ānandabhairavi
*Tāḷam:*  Miśra jti ēka tāḷaṁ
*Composer:* Muttusvāmy Dīkṣitar
Notation From "Saṅgīta sampradāya pradarṣini" by Subbarāma dīkṣitar
Notated by Swathi Renganath
### Ārōhaṇam -     S G1 G1 M1 P D1 P S N2 S
### Avarōhaṇam -   S N2 D1 P M1 M1 M1 G1 G1 R2 S
##Lyrics
###Pallavi
kamalāṁbā saṁrakṣatu māṁ
hṛtkamalā nagara nivāsinī amba
###Anupallavi
sumanasārādhitābja mukhī
sundaramana priyakara sakhī
kamalajānanda bōdha sukhī
kāntā tāra pañjara śukī
###Caraṇaṁ
tripurādi cakrēśvarī aṇimādi siddhīśvarī
nitya kāmēśvarī
kṣiti pura trai-lōkya mōhana cakravartinī
prakaṭa yōginī
sura ripu mahiṣāsurādi mardinī
nigama purāṇādi saṁvēdinī
###Madhyamakālaṁ
tripurēśi guru guha jananī
tripura bhanjana ranjanī
madhu ripu sahōdarī talōdarī
tripura sundarī mahēśvarī

## Danḍāyudhapāṇim
*Rāgam* : Ānandabhairavi
*Tāḷam:*  Rūpakam
*Composer:* Muttusvāmy Dīkṣitar
Notation From "Saṅgīta sampradāya pradarṣini" by Subbarāma dīkṣitar
Notated by Swathi Renganath
### Ārōhaṇam -     S G1 G1 M1 P D1 P S N2 S
### Avarōhaṇam -   S N2 D1 P M1 M1 M1 G1 G1 R2 S
##Lyrics
*Pallavi:* Danḍāyudhapāniṁ daṁḍita daitya śrēṇiṁ dayā nidhiṁ
bhajarē hṛdaya satataṁ sura vinutaṁ
*Anupallvi:* Camdāṁśu śatakōṭi saṁkāśaṁ jagadīśamakhanḍa
rūpaṁ anḍajamani Manḍala maya kunḍalādi
*Madhyamakālam:* Manḍitāṁga sukumāraṁ khaṁḍita tāraka śūraṁ
paṁḍita tara navavīraṁ caṁḍikēśāvatāraṁ
*Caraṇaṁ:* Maṁdasmita vadanāraviṁdaṁ mātula gōviṁdaṁ
śaraṇāgata surabṛndaṁ bahumānita muni brṁdaṁ
paripālitamucukuṁdaṁ praṇata viriṁci mukuṁdaṁ adhara madhura
makaraṁdaṁ mṛdutara vacanamanaṁdaṁ māyā mūlakaṁdaṁ
skaṁdaṁ
*Madhyamakālam* Suṁdara kara caraṇāraviṁdaṁ raṭhagaja
turaṅgaṁ bṛṁdaṁ satyañjānā naṁdaṁ ati svaccaṁdaṁ

##Tyāgarāja yōga vaibhavam
*Rāgam* : Ānandabhairavi
*Tāḷam:*  Rūpakaṁ
*Composer:* Muttusvāmy Dīkṣitar
Notation From "Saṅgīta sampradāya pradarṣini" by Subbarāma dīkṣitar
Notated by Swathi Renganath
### Ārōhaṇam -     S G1 G1 M1 P D1 P S N2 S
### Avarōhaṇam -   S N2 D1 P M1 M1 M1 G1 G1 R2 S
##Lyrics
###Pallavi
Tyāgarāja yōga vaibhavaṁ sadāśivaṁ
Tyāgarāja yōga vaibhavaṁ sadāśrayāmi
Tyāgarāja yōga vaibhavaṁ
Aga rāja yōga vaibhavaṁ
Rāja yōga vaibhavaṁ
Yōga vaibhavaṁ
Vaibhavaṁ
Bhavaṁ
Vaṁ
###samaṣṭi caraṇaṁ
Nāga rāja vinuta padaṁ nāda bindu kalāspadaṁ
Yōgi rāja vidita padaṁ yugapadbhōga mōkṣa pradaṁ
Yōga rūdha nāma rūpa viśva sṛṣṭyādi karaṇaṁ
Yuga parivṛṭyābda māsa dina ghaṭikādyāvaraṇa
###Madhyamakālaṁ
Śrī guru guha guruṁ saccidānanda bhairavīśaṁ
Śiva śaktyādi sakala tatva svarūpa prakāśaṁ
Śaṁ
prakāśaṁ
svarūpa prakāśaṁ
tatva svarūpa prakāśaṁ
sakala tatva svarūpa prakāśaṁ
Śiva śaktyādi sakala tatva svarūpa prakāśaṁ

#Apadūruku lōnaitinē
*Rāgam:* Khamās
*Tāḷam:* Dēśādi
*Vāggēyakāra:* Śrī Tiru̠ppanaṅdal Paṭṭābhirāmayyā
**Lyrics**
**Pallavi**
Apadūruku lōnaitinē capala cittamu cēdanē
**Anupallavi**
Ē pāpi nāpai darēnukā Ē pāpamu lēka (Apadūruku)
**Caraṇam 1**
Vēḍukala jūḍanē īdu cēdela tōḍanē gūḍi atani
mēḍakēkidē vāḍu nā celikāḍanē (Apadūruku)
**Caraṇam 2**
Sāreku sāmini dūritini gāni navvitē jāriṇiyani
Ūrivāralu vērē pēriḍi nannu pilicerē (Apadūruku)
**Caraṇam 3**
Ciruta naṭanuṇḍina biruducē guṇavantudau vara
tāḷavanē śunitō sarasamāḍusu gūḍitinani (Apadūruku)

#Apadūruku lōnaitinē
*Rāgam:* Khamās
*Tāḷam:* Madhyādi (2 kaḷai)
*Vāggēyakāra:* Śrī Tiru̠ppanaṅdal Paṭṭābhirāmayyā
**Lyrics**
**Pallavi**
Apadūruku lōnaitinē capala cittamu cēdanē
**Anupallavi**
Ē pāpi nāpai darēnukā Ē pāpamu lēka (Apadūruku)
**Caraṇam 1**
Vēḍukala jūḍanē īdu cēdela tōḍanē gūḍi atani
mēḍakēkidē vāḍu nā celikāḍanē (Apadūruku)
**Caraṇam 2**
Sāreku sāmini dūritini gāni navvitē jāriṇiyani
Ūrivāralu vērē pēriḍi nannu pilicerē (Apadūruku)
**Caraṇam 3**
Ciruta naṭanuṇḍina biruducē guṇavantudau vara
tāḷavanē śunitō sarasamāḍusu gūḍitinani (Apadūruku)

**Anupallavi**

Cokkapu yauvanamu gala cakkani puruṣuḍu yuvatula

#Apuḍu Manasu
*Rāgam:* Khamās
*Tāḷam:* Rūpakam
*Vāggēyakāra:* Śrī Paṭnam Subramaṇia Iyer
**Lyrics**
**Pallavi**
Apuḍu manasu nilucunaḍē ativarōyidēti māṭa
**Anupallavi**
Capalamēṭi keṭuvaṇṭi sāmarthyamugala vārai nanu
**Caraṇam 1**
Cokkapu yauvanamu gala cakkani puruṣuḍu yuvatula
**Like Anupallavi**
pakkajēri sarasamugā balkucu kanusaiga jēyaka
**Caraṇam 2**
Varada venkaṭēśa varuḍiṭu surata sambhramamu telisi
**Like Anupallavi**
taruṇamerigi māruḍu viricaramulu konivēyaka

full_text:
# Aruṇōdayamē
*Composer:* Sri Lalgudi G. Jayaraman
*Ragam:* Bauḷi
*Talam:* Ādi
*Patantaram:* Sri Lalgudi G. Jayaraman
## Lyrics
aruṇōdayamē aṉbiṉ vaḍivamē
aṉṉayē niṉ padam eṉṟum paṇivōm
arumaṟaigaḷ pōṟṟum ādi śakti nī
aṉbarellām vāḻa āḷum dayāpari
karuṇai deivam nīye, kāttaruḷē
அருணோதயமே அன்பின் வடிவமே
அன்னையே நின் பதம் என்றும் பணிவோம்
அருமறைகள் போற்றும் ஆதி சக்தி நீ
அன்பரெல்லாம் வாழ ஆளும் தயாபரி
கருணை தெய்வம் நீயே காத்தருளே

## MĀNASA GURUGUHA
*Rāgam* : Ānandabhairavi
*Tāḷam:*  Tiśra jāti ēka tāḷam
*Composer:* Muttusvāmy Dīkṣitar̄
Notation From "Saṅgīta sampradāya pradarṣini" by Subbarāma dīkṣitar
Notated by Swathi Renganath
### Ārōhaṇam -     S G1 G1 M1 P D1 P S N2 S
### Avarōhaṇam -   S N2 D1 P M1 M1 M1 G1 G1 R2 S
##Lyrics
*Pallavi :* Mānasa guru guha rūpaṁ bhajarē rē
māyā-maya hṛttāpaṁ tyajarē rē
*Anupallavi:* Mānava janmani samprāptē sati paramātmani
niratiśaya sukhaṁ vrajarē rē
*Caraṇam:* Satva guṇōpdhi sahita sadāśivaṁ svāvidyā samēta
jīvōdbhavaṁ tatvaṁ tāmasa yuta viśva vaibhavaṁ tārakēśvaraṁ
ānanda bhairavaṁ
*Madhyamakala Sahityam:*  Natvā śrī guru caraṇaṁ kṛtvā nāma
smaraṇaṁ jitvā mōhāvaraṇaṁ matvā tvadēka śaraṇaṁ

full_text:
# Dasharatha Kumārā
###Rāgam : Āṉandabhairavi
###Tāḷaṁ : Ādhi
---------
</br>
## Pallavi:
### dasharatha kumārā raghurāmā dhisai eṅgum pugazh azhagā thirumāl avathāraṉe
### dashamugaṉ thaṉṉai veṉdra athithī rādhavamuṉiyiṉ yāgam kātha dāyāḷathayai purivai
</br>
## Anupallavi:
### kasadara uḷḷam koṇda aṉṉai sīthai kaḷikkave māyamāṉai thēdi sendra shrī rāghavaṉe
### asadarai azhikkave anumaṉai thuṇai koṉda iyaṉē ādharitharuḷvāi
</br>
## Muktayi Svara-Sahitya:
### akaligai sābam theerthavaṉē arunthava yāgam kāthavaṉe
### araṉiṉ villai murithavaṉe aṇṇai seethayai maṇardhavaṉe
### māmaṇi makudam thaṉṉai maruthu thuravaram thaṉai maṉamuvarnthētru maghizhṅdhu
### villum ambum kaiyil ēndhi kallum mullum kadumbu tharum niraivaṉam adaindha
</br>
##Charanam:
### arpudham nigazhthum undhaṉ porpadhamē ānandha rāmaṉe
</br>
##Chittai Svara-Sahitya:
### 1) anbum paṇbum koṇdu bharathaṉ poojai seidha
### 2) ārparithu maran ver aruthu vaṉam seer kulaithu perum sōḷuraithu vandha vāli yeṉum vānara rājanai veṉdru vāzh vaḷitha vēranē varamaruḷ
### 3) thāram oruvaḷē eṉum aram koorum uṉathavathāram thuyar thudaithu uyarvaḷithu magizhvaḷikkum nigarila dheivame
### unai niṉaindheṉ urukiyē paṇindheṉ uruthuṉai ulaginil nee kōdhaṇda rāmā
### vā thanjam undhaṉ thiruvadithaṉ eṉdrum edhilum niraivum shree rāmā seethai nāthā dhiṉam muraḷi maṉam niṉaiya varam aruḷum
---------

# தசரத குமாரா
### ராகம் : ஆனந்தபைரவி
### தாளம் : ஆதி
---------
</ப்ர்>
## பல்லவி:
### தசரத குமாரா ரகு ராமா திசையெங்கும் புகழ் அழகா திருமால் அவதாரனே
### தசமுகன் தன்னை வென்ற அதி தீரா தவ முனியின் யாகம் காத்த தயாளா தயை புரிவாய்
</ப்ர்>
## அனுபல்லவி:
### கசடறு உள்ளம் கொண்ட அன்னை சீதை களிக்கவே மாய மானை தேடி சென்ற ஸ்ரீ ராகவனே
### அசடரை அழிக்கவே அனுமனை துணை கொன்ட ஐயனே ஆதரித்தருள்வாய்
</ப்ர்>
## முக்தாயி ஸ்வர-ஸாஹித்யம்:
### அகலிகை சாபம் தீர்த்தவனே அரும் தவ யாகம் காத்தவனே
### அரனின் வில்லை முறித்தவனே அன்னை சீதையை மணந்தவனே
### மாமணி மகுடம் தன்னை மறுத்து துறவறம் தனை மனமுவந்தேற்று மகிழ்ந்து
### வில்லும் அம்பும் கையில் ஏந்தி கல்லும் முல்லும் கடும் புதரும் நிறை வனம் அடைந்த
</ப்ர்>
##சரணம்:
### அற்புதம் நிகழ்த்தும் உந்தன் பொற் பதமே ஆனந்த ராமனனே
</ப்ர்>
##சிட்டை ஸ்வர-ஸாஹித்யம்:
### 1) அன்பும் பண்பும் கொண்டு பரதன் பூஜை செய்த
### 2) ஆர்ப்பரித்து மரம் வேரறுத்து வனம் சீர் குலைத்து பெரும் சூளுரைத்து வந்த வாலியெனும் வானர ராஜனை வென்று வாழ்வளித்த வீரனே வரமருள்
### 3) தாரம் ஒருவளே எனும் அறம் கூறும் உனதாவதாரம் துயர் துடைத்து உயிர்வளித்து மகிழ்வளிக்கும் நிகரில்லா தெய்வமே
### உனை நினைந்தேன் உருகியே பணிந்தேன் உரு துணை உலகில் நீ கோதண்ட ராமா
### வா தஞ்சம் உந்தன் திருவடிதான் என்றும் எதிலும் நிறைவும் ஸ்ரீ ராமா சீதை நாதா தினம் முரளி மனம் நினைய வரம் அருளும்
---------

full_text:
#Dhanyāsi Varṇam
*Rāga*: Dhanyāsi
*Tāla*: Ādi
*Composer*: Mysore Sadāśiva Rāo
*Ārōhaṇam*: S G1 M1 P N1 Ṡ
*Avarōhaṇam*: Ṡ N1 D1 P M1 G1 R1 S
#Sāhityā:
Pallavī: ē maguva bōdhiñcerā nīkendukinta mōḍi jēsēvu
Anupallavī: cāmarāja bhūpāla tanaya sarasa śrī kṛṣṇa rājēndra
Muktai svara sāhitya: nī manasu kanukontini nijamuka niluvani mōhamu telicerā nelata
dūrina paluku ceviki hitavuka vini nanu bāyakanyāyamani inicitivō

full_text:
#Gānam Isaithu
##Rāgam : Rāgamālikā
Tāḷam : Ādi
---------------------------
##Pallavi:
###1) Valaji:
###gāṉam isaithu niṉdrāyo enṉai marandha kāraṇam oṉdru solvāyō kaṇṇa kuzhalil
###2) Dharmavathi
###māṉam kākavē seṉdrāyō orumurai māmugam kātti selvāyō maṇivaṇṇā
##Anupallavi:
###3) Vasantha:
###dhāṉam ketkavē seṉdrāyō udaṉvara thāmadam iṉṉum seyvāyō kanna maranthu
###4) Dhanyasi:
###nēlam nirai vaṇṇa mēṇiyaṉe iṉimel nē varum vēḷai solva̱yo karuṇai koṇdu
##Muktāyi Svara-Sāhitya:
###1) Dhanyasi:
###kālingaṉ mēdhiṉil nal nadaṇam seidhu
###2) Vasantha:
###vadham purindāyo kamsaṉai veṉdru
###3) Dharmavathi:
###kalaithaṉayo māmalai karam thōkiya
###4) Valaji:
###eṉṉaiyum maranthaṉayo kaṇṇā
##Charanam:
###Charukesi:
###āṉandam koṇdu nadaṉam ādi varuvāye gōpiyargaḷ kōzhndidave
##Chittai Svara-Sāhitya:
###1) Charukesi:
###geethai uraithu nalla pādhai vaguththa madhava
###2) Surya:
###mādam thōrum oḷi māmaṇi dheepamum mayaṉ undhaṉ vazhi mādhargal nādavum
###māṉaseegamāi māyam seyyamal māyaṉai thēdiye mālai idavaruvai
###3) Amrithavarshini:
###sāgasam nee seivadheṉṉa kannā kāraṇam indriye karuṉai seyyāmal
###māmugam kātavum maṉam irangavum nān pāyiram pādiṉeṉ pagal iravāga
###thāmadham iṉdriye thavithidum pēdhaiku nee maṉam negizhndhu varam tharuvāye
###sāgaram mēdhiṉil pāmbaṇaiyin mel paḷḷi koṇda parandhāmaṉ padam nāda
--------------------

full_text:
#கானம் இசைத்து
##ராகம் : ராகமாலிகா
தாளம் : ஆதி
---------------------------
##பல்லவி:
###1) வலசி:
###கானம் இசைத்து நின்றாயோ எனை மறந்த காரணம் ஒன்று சொல்வாயோ கண்ணா குழலில்
###2) தர்மவதி
###மானம் காக்கவே சென்றாயோ ஒருமுறை மாமுகம் காட்டி சென்றாயோ மணிவண்ணா
##அனுபல்லவி:
###3) வசந்தா:
###தானம் கேட்கவே சென்றாயோ உடன்வர தாமதம் இன்னும் செய்வாயோ கண்ணா மறந்து
###4) தன்யாஸி:
###நீலம் நிறை வண்ண மேணியனே இனிமேல் நீ வரும் வேளை சொல்வாயோ கருணை கொண்டு
##முக்தாயி ஸ்வர-ஸாஹித்யம்:
###1) தன்யாஸி:
###காலிங்கன் மீதினில் நல் நடணம் செய்து
###2) வசந்தா :
###வதம் புரிந்தாயோ கம்சனை வென்று
###3) தர்மவதி:
###களைத்தனயோ மாமலை கரம் தூக்கிய
###4) வலசி:
###என்னையும் மறந்தனயோ கண்ணா
##சரணம்:
###சாருகேசி:
###ஆனந்தம் கொண்டு நடனம் ஆடி வருவாயே கோபியர்கள் சூழ்ந்திடவே
##சிட்டை ஸ்வர-ஸாஹித்யம்:
###1) சாருகேசி:
###கீதை உறைத்து நல்ல பாதை வகுத்த மாதவா
###2) சூர்யா:
###மாதம் தோறும் ஒளி மாமணி தீபமும் மாயன் உந்தன் வழி மாதர்கள் நாடவும்
###மானசீகமா மாயம் செய்யாமல் மாயனை தேடியே மாலை இடவருவாய்
###3) அமிர்தவர்ஷினி:
###சாகசம் நீ செய்வதென்ன கண்ணா காரணம் இன்றியே கருணை செய்யாமல்
###மாமுகம் காட்டவும் மனம் இறங்கவும் நான் பாயிரம் பாடினேன் பகல் இரவாக
###தாமதம் இன்றியே தவித்திடும் பேதைக்கு நீ மனம் நெகிழ்ந்து வரம் தருவாயே
###சாகரம் மீதினில் பாம்பணையின் மேல் பள்ளி கொண்ட பரந்தாமன் பதம் நாட
--------------------

# Gaṇarājēna Rakṣitōham Composer: Sri Muttusvāmi Dīkṣitar Rāgam: Ārabhi Tāḷam: Misra Cāpu Pāt̤āntaram: Dr. Karaikudi S. Subramanian 
notation font size = 12
notation small font size = 10
stretch = 1.1
stretch space = 0.6
## Ārabhi tala pattern = , > Ārōhaṇam S R m P D S+ _ _ > Avarōhaṇam S+ N D P m G R S ## Lyrics ### Pallavi gaṇarājēṉa rakṣitōhaṁ guṇijaṉaṉuta pallavapadēṉa ### Samaṣti Caranam Aṇimādyaṣṭa-siddhippradēṉa Māṇikyamakuṭādidhareṇa Mantriṇi pūjita sumukhēṉa mānitaguruguha vanditēṉa Diṉakarakōṭipprakāśēṉa vinatāśritamandārēṇa Maṉupūjita pāśāṅkuśēṉa kānanasthita brahmmacaryēṇa ## Translation A prayer to Lord Ganesh. I am protected by ... One who gives all kinds of ‘siddhi-s’ including ‘aNimaa’ One who is adorned by such jewelry as diamond One who is worshiped by ‘Mantrini’ One who has a beautiful face One who is respected by ‘Guruguha’ (Lord Subrammanya) One who shines with the brightness of one crore Suns One who gives all that is wanted by the devotees One who has the ‘binding-thread’ and trident One who dwells as ‘brahmachari’ (unmarried) in a forest One who has the soft feet like flower Aṣṭa Siddhis are – Aṇima -The ability to reduce yourself to the size to the tiniest particle and turn invisible. Mahima- The ability to grow to the size of the largest thing in existence. Garima – becoming the heaviest thing in existence. Laghima -The ability to become like the lightest particle and fly. Prapti - Being in any or all places at the same time. Parakaṁya -The ability to manifest your thoughts into reality. Istva -The ability to make all act as per your wishes. Vastva -The ability to attain the absolute. ## Audio tracks **NOTE:** Audio track support is currently experimental and will undergo significant changes in presentation. Audio recordings rendered by Dr. Karaikudi S. Subramanian 1. [Text recitation][WordsTrack] 2. [Svara rendition][SvaraTrack] 3. [Vina rendition][VinaTrack] 4. full_text:
# Gaṇarājēna Rakṣitōham Composer: Sri Muttusvāmi Dīkṣitar Rāgam: Ārabhi Tāḷam: Misra Cāpu Pāt̤āntaram: Dr. Karaikudi S. Subramanian 
notation font size = 12
notation small font size = 10
stretch = 1.1
stretch space = 0.6
## Ārabhi tala pattern = , > Ārōhaṇam S R m P D S+ _ _ > Avarōhaṇam S+ N D P m G R S ## Lyrics ### Pallavi gaṇarājēṉa rakṣitōhaṁ guṇijaṉaṉuta pallavapadēṉa ### Samaṣti Caranam Aṇimādyaṣṭa-siddhippradēṉa Māṇikyamakuṭādidhareṇa Mantriṇi pūjita sumukhēṉa mānitaguruguha vanditēṉa Diṉakarakōṭipprakāśēṉa vinatāśritamandārēṇa Maṉupūjita pāśāṅkuśēṉa kānanasthita brahmmacaryēṇa ## Translation A prayer to Lord Ganesh. I am protected by ... One who gives all kinds of ‘siddhi-s’ including ‘aNimaa’ One who is adorned by such jewelry as diamond One who is worshiped by ‘Mantrini’ One who has a beautiful face One who is respected by ‘Guruguha’ (Lord Subrammanya) One who shines with the brightness of one crore Suns One who gives all that is wanted by the devotees One who has the ‘binding-thread’ and trident One who dwells as ‘brahmachari’ (unmarried) in a forest One who has the soft feet like flower Aṣṭa Siddhis are – Aṇima -The ability to reduce yourself to the size to the tiniest particle and turn invisible. Mahima- The ability to grow to the size of the largest thing in existence. Garima – becoming the heaviest thing in existence. Laghima -The ability to become like the lightest particle and fly. Prapti - Being in any or all places at the same time. Parakaṁya -The ability to manifest your thoughts into reality. Istva -The ability to make all act as per your wishes. Vastva -The ability to attain the absolute. ## Audio tracks **NOTE:** Audio track support is currently experimental and will undergo significant changes in presentation. Audio recordings rendered by Dr. Karaikudi S. Subramanian 1. [Text recitation][WordsTrack] 2. [Svara rendition][SvaraTrack] 3. [Vina rendition][VinaTrack] 4. # Gītam : Śyāmāśāstri
*Rāgam*: Paraju
*Tāḷam*:  Tiśra Tripuṭa
### Text
Kāmāḳsi karuṇā kaṭāḳsi kāmāḳsi lōkasāḳsiṇi
Kāmāḳsi karuṇā kaṭāḳsi kāmāḳsi mām pāhi baṅgāru
Kāmāḳsi karuṇā kaṭāḳsi kāmāḳsi mām pāhi
(1) Kāmakōṭipīṭhagatē kāmitaphaladāyikē Kāmāḳsi māmpāhi kañcikāmāḳsimāmpāhi
(2) Paṅkajadaḷalōcanē saṅkaṭabhayamōcanē śaṅkari māmpāhi śiva śaṅkari māmpāhi
(3)Śyāmākṛṣṇa pālita janani sāmagāna vinōdini śyāmaḷē mām pāhi śuka śyāmaḷē mām pāhi

# Pada Varṇam
*Rāgam*: Khamās
*Tāḷam*: Tiśra Jāti Ēka Tāḷa
*Composer*: Subbarāma Dīkṣita
##Text
## Pallavī
Eṁtaninēdelu pudurā yelāgu tāḷudura
## Anupallavī
maṁtukekku vīrava saṁtatiyāgarāja nāsā
##Svara Sāhitya
Sāraguṇabalimiganala nīrajasuma śaramulana pāramugada mimigulaga māruḍuparape śritajana
surasāla yikatāḷa nurabāla calamēlakāmāṁ takamā nitaramā kāṁtavinumā brahmādinuta
##Caraṇam 1
Tāpamadhikamā yanurā dayayuṁcuṭaku samayamidirā
##Svarasāhitya
Rārādānīdāna yīrārāpēlā sadāviraha
##Caraṇam 2
Rē pagali vādērālēma bōdhana vinakarā
##Svarasāhitya
1. Nēniraparādhurā sarāgamuna brōcuṭakunu
2. Nī suguṇamulu vinidanē nī sāmi pyamunu jēri valapumīriyidāri ninē kōritōri
##Caraṇam 3
Kōpamēra kavugilirā kōrinavaramulīrā
##Svara Sāhitya
1. Durāgatamutagadurāmaravavaladurā viṁtagayiṁta
2. Sāmrājyaphalada vinōda kṙatapāda mahitavēda karuṇarāda piluvarāda palukarādanatēṁdraśrīda
##Caraṇam 4
Śrīpuramunavelayumā śrī tyāgarāja sāmi
##Svarasāhitya
1. Svāṁtamuna galugupaṁta misūmaṁtataga daṁta kāṁtaka
2. Sārasā ramuleriginadoravani dalacitisu mā mā rumāvula balgulu mulgulu gavarala
nalasitara kalayanidi tadigadara yikanalukamā naghanamā numaumā kāṁta golicivēmā runiṭu

##Mahilō Amba
Ragam:*Ānandabhairavi*
Taḷam: *Ādi*
Composer: *Śyāma Śāstry*
Notation From "Compositions of Śyāma Śāstry" by T.K.Govinda rao
Notated by Swathi Renganath
##Lyrics
Pallavi: Mahilō ambā nīdu
mahimātiśayamenna taramā
Anupallavi: Ahi bhūṣaṇuni rāṇī śankari
ambikā bṛhan-nāyaki gaurī
Caraṇam:- Sāma gāna nutā sārasa padā
tāmasamu jēsē tāḷanē
Śyāma kṛṣṇa sōdari śankar
śyāmaḷāmbā nīvē māyamma

# Manasu Nilpa Śakti - Ābhōgi
*Composer:* Tyagaraja
*Rāgaṁ:* Ābhōgi
*Tāḷaṁ:* Ādi
Notation adapted from [Vidya Subramanian's 2-part lesson](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BdYN45rupEY)
## Sāhityam
*Pallavi:* Manasu nilpa śakti lēkapōtē madhura ghaṁṭa virula pūjēmi jēyunu
*Anupallavi:* Ghana durmaduḍai tā munigite kāvēri maṁdākini yetubrōcuno
*Charanam:* Sōmidamma sogasugānḍra kōritē sōmayāji swargārhudouno
Kāmakrōdhuḍu tapaṁbonarcitē kāci rakṣiṁcunō tyāgarājanuta

# Mandāri varṇam by Lalgudi G. Jayarāman
*Composer*: Lalgudi G. Jayarāman
*Ragam*: Mandāri
*Talam*: Ādi
*Patantaram*: Lalgudi G. Jayarāman
*Notation*: Dr. Karaikudi S. Subramanian
**Note**: Needs a second eye.
## Lyrics
nivē gāni vērevarunnāru
nirdaya valē nā nī rajākṣa
nī vē vēlpu vani ninnē kōriti
kāvavē skanda cinta dīrcci nannu
karuṇimpa rādā gouri bāla

##Marivērē - Ānandhabhairavi - Miśra Cāpu - Śyāmā Sāstri
*Version:* Dr. R. Hemalatha
###Ārōhaṇa s g1 r2 g1 m1 p d2 p s
###Avarōhaṇa s n1 d2 p m1 g1 r2 s
>Note: Bhāṣāṅga rāga. Anya svaras are Antara gāndhāra, śuddha dhaivata and Kākali niṣāda
> In this notation these notes are denoted by capital G, capital D and Capital N respectively.  In this rāga the catuśruti dhaivata is in its original position in the phrase s n d p whereas it is in kaiśiki nis̄āda position in the other phrases. For example, in the first phrase in the pallavi it is in kaiśiki niṣāda position

###Lyrics
**Pallavi** : mari vērē gatiyevarammā
mahilō nannu brōcuṭaku
**Anupallavi** :
śaraṇāgata rakṣaki nīvēyani
sadā nammiti nammitini mīnākṣī mari
**Caranam** : śuka śyāmaḷā ghana śyāma kṛṣṇuni
sōdarī kaumārī
akaḷanka kalā dharī bimbādharī
apāra kṛpā nidhi nīvē rakṣimpa

name: Mogumogena tiruppugaz
full_text:
###Tiruppugaḻ - Mogumogena
###Rāgā - Kusuma vicitra
###Tāḷā - Khaṇda cāpu
</br>
####Sāhityam\
Mogumogena naraikoṇmalar varkatthi larpuḍaiya
muḷarimayi lanaiyavargaḷ neindhukka ruttumaḻai
mugilanaiya sūḻalsariya vokkak kanattuvana radipāra
mulaipugaḷaga meḻavaḷaigaḷ satthikka mutthamaṇi
Muruvaliḷa nilavutara metthattha vitthasila
Moḻipadara viḍaituvaḷa vaṭṭaci laippuruva iṇkōḍa ;
</br>
Agilmiruga madasalisam viṭṭup paṇitthamalai
Ramaḷipaḍa voḷiviravu ratnapra pailluḻaiyo
ḍamarporuda neḍiyaviḻi cekkac civakkamara mananīdhi -
Aḍalvaḍivu nalamidanil matkac cerukkiyuḷa
Murugakarai perukavuḍa likkap paḻutthuviḻu
Maḷaviloru paramavoḷi yirpukki rukkaveṇai ninaiyādhō
</br>
Segutageṇa geṇasekuta cekkut cekuccekuta
kirutaseya seyakiruta tokkut thogutthogut
ḍimiṭaḍimi ḍimiḍimiṭa ḍiṭṭiṭṭi ḍiḍimiḍa  ḍiḍitīthō -
Tirikaḍaga kaḍagatiri tittikra titrikaḍa
Timirtatimi timirtatimi tittitti tittitti
seṇuseṇuta taṇaseṇuta taṭṭit tikutṛkuḍa tatitītō ;
</br>
Takuḍatigu tikuḍatimi tattatta tittikuḍa
kugukuguku kugukuguku kukkukku kukkukut
Tarararara riririririri rirritta rirririri yenavēnīḷ -
Sadimuḻavu palavumiru pakkatti saippamudu
Samaiyapayi raviyidaya mutkitpṛ mikkavuyar
Taṇigaimalai tanilmayili nirtthatthi nirkavala perumāḷē .

full_text:
###Tirupugaḻ - Mundutamiḻmālai
###Rāgā - Harikāmbōdhi
###Tāḷā - catuśra tṛpuṭa
</br>
####Sāhityam
Mundutamiḻ mālai kōḍik kōḍi
Sandamōḍu nīḍu pāḍip pāḍi
Muñjarmanai vāsal thēḍit thēḍi yuḻalādē -
</br>
Mundaivinai yēva rāmar pōga
Maṅgaiyargaḷ kādhal dūrat thēga
Mundhaḍimai yēnai yāḷat thānu munaimīdē ;
</br>
Dhindhitthimi thodi thīdat thīdi
Thandatthana thāna thānat thāna
Señcdṇagu sēgu tāḷat tōḍu naḍamāḍuñ -
</br>
Señciriya kālvi sālat tōgai
Tuṅga anu kūla pārvait thīra
Sempnmayil mīdhi lēyep pōdu varuvāyē ;
</br>
Andaṇmarai vēl̤vi kāvar kāra
Sentamiṯcol paravin mālai kāra
Aṇḍamarupa kāra sēvar kāra muḍimēlē -
</br>
Añjalisei vōrgaḷ nēyak kāra
Kunruruva ēvum vēlaik ka2ra
Andamvegu vāna rūpak kāra eṯilāna ;
</br>
Sinduramin mēvu pōhak kāra
Vindaikura mādu vēḷaik kāra
Señcolaḍi yārgaḷ vāral kāra edhirāna -
</br>
Señjamarai māyu māyak kāra
Tuṅga raṇasūra sūraik kāra
Sendinagar vāṯu māṇmaikkāra perumāḷē .

name: Naccarava mendru
full_text:
###Tiruppugaḻ- Naccarava meṉṟu
###Rāgā - Karṉataka kamācu
###Tāḷā - Catuśra triputa
</br>
Naccarava meṉṟu naccarava meṉṟu
Naccumiḻ kaḷaṅga - Matiyālum
Nattoḍu muḻaṅga nattoḍu muḻaṅgu
Nattirai vaḻaṅgu - Kaḍalālum
Iccai yuṇarviṉdri yiccai yenavanta
Iccirumi nontu - Meliyātē
Ettaṉaiyu neñcil ettaṉa muyaṅgi
Ettaṉaiyi lañca - Leṉavēṇum
Pacaimayil koṇḍu pacai maramaṅgai
Pacaimalai yeṅgu - Muraivōṉē
Pattiyuḍa ṉiṉdru pattiseyu maṉpar
Pattira maṇinta - Kazalōṉē
Kaccivar kurumbai kaccavar virumbu
Kacciyila marnta - Katirvēlā
Karpaga vanaṅkoḷ karpaga vicumpar
Kaittaḷai kaḷainta - Perumāḷē .
</br>

#Varṇam: Saurāṣṭram - Nāmanavini
*Rāgam* : Saurāṣṭram
*Tāḷam:* Caturaśra jāti aṭa tāḷam
*Composer:* Śyāmā śāstri
### Ārōhaṇam -     S r G m P m D N S
### Avarōhaṇam -    S N D n D P m G r S
## Lyrics
*Pallavi:*  Nā manavini vinu ī vēḷa brōvu kānci kāmākṣammā
pāmarapālini ō jananī kṛpa jūḍavammā
*Anupallavi:*  Nemmadini nī nāmamē dikkani ninu nammitinammā māyammā
*Ciṭṭasvara sahityam:*  pādakamalayugamulapai gatiyanina
ī sannidhini vaccina dāsuna nannu canavuna rakṣincuṭaku parula
ī dharalō telisi aparādhamulanu manninci nīvu mā duritamu dīrccipuḍu dayajūci
nā manavini ninu ī vēḷa brōvu kāñci kāmākṣammā
*Caraṇam:* Bhaktuḍaina nāpai inta vādā māyammā muktinīyavē
śyāmakṛṣṇa nuta amba

#Nārīmaṇī nīkainadirā jāra cōramā
*Rāgam:* Khamās
*Tāḷam:* Ādi
*Vāggēyakāra:* Śrī Dharmapuri Subbarāyar
**Lyrics**
**Pallavi**
Nārīmaṇī nīkainadirā jāra cōramā
**Anupallavi**
Dhīra vinarā śrī dharmapurādhipa mā cakkani kādaṭamā
**Caraṇam 1**
Bōḍi nērccina rati pāṭalu saiyāḍalēva dhūṭiyu sari sāṭila pāḍiyana kādaṭamā
**Caraṇam 2**
Māru balkēru gani mānini gadarā kāmini tārādhipa nī bhāva kādhenarē sarasaku
**Caraṇam 3**
Māra viruni viricaramula kōrvadika rārā saraguṇanu cē kōrā maru kēḷiki mā

#Nārīmaṇī nīkainadirā jāra cōramā
*Rāgam:* Khamās
*Tāḷam:* Ādi
*Vāggēyakāra:* Śrī Dharmapuri Subbarāyar
**Lyrics**
**Pallavi**
Nārīmaṇī nīkainadirā jāra cōramā
**Anupallavi**
Dhīra vinarā śrī dharmapurādhipa mā cakkani kādaṭamā
**Caraṇam 1**
Bōḍi nērccina rati pāṭalu saiyāḍalēva dhūṭiyu sari sāṭila pāḍiyana kādaṭamā
**Caraṇam 2**
Māru balkēru gani mānini gadarā kāmini tārādhipa nī bhāva kādhenarē sarasaku
**Caraṇam 3**
Māra viruni viricaramula kōrvadika rārā saraguṇanu cē kōrā maru kēḷiki mā

full_text:
#Nārīmaṇī nīkainadirā jāra cōramā
*Rāgam:* Khamās
*Tāḷam:* Ādi
*Vāggēyakāra:* Śrī Dharmapuri Subbarāyar
**Lyrics**
**Pallavi**
Nārīmaṇī nīkainadirā jāra cōramā
**Anupallavi**
Dhīra vinarā śrī dharmapurādhipa mā cakkani kādaṭamā
**Caraṇam 1**
Bōḍi nērccina rati pāṭalu saiyāḍalēva dhūṭiyu sari sāṭila pāḍiyana kādaṭamā
**Caraṇam 2**
Māru balkēru gani mānini gadarā kāmini tārādhipa nī bhāva kādhenarē sarasaku
**Caraṇam 3**
Māra viruni viricaramula kōrvadika rārā saraguṇanu cē kōrā maru kēḷiki mā
## Pallavi

aksharas per line = 32

## Nidhi chala Sukama
*Ragam*: Kalyani
*Tālam*:  Miśra cāpu
### Text
Pallavi:
nidhi cāla sukhamā?
rāmuni sannidhi sēva sukhamā?
nijamuga balku manasa!
Anupallavi:
dadhi navanīta kśīramulu rucō? dāśarathi
dhyāna bhajana sudhārasamu shūcō?
Charanam:
dama śamamanu gangā snānamu sukhamā?
kardama durviṣaya kūpa snānamu sukhamā?
mamatā bandhana yuta narastuti sukhamā?
surapati tyāgarājanutuni kīrtana sukhamā?

(Written in second speed)

# Nīkē Teliyaka
*Rāgam*: Ānandabhairavi
*Tāḷam*: Ādi(1)
*Composer*: Tyāgarājā
Notation from "Śri Kṛti maṇi mālai" of Rangaramanuja Iyengar
Notatd by Swathi Renganath
##Lyrics
###Pallavi
nīkē teliyaka pōtē
nēnēmi sēyudurā
####Anupallavi
lōkādhāruḍavai nā
lōni prajvaliñcu jāli (nīkē)
####Caranam
endendu jūcina endendu palikina
endendu sēviñcina endendu pūjiñcina
andandu nīvani tōcuṭanduku nī
pādāravindamunu dhyānincinadendukani tyāgarāja sannuta (nīkē)

full_text:
###Tiruppugaḻ - Nialiyāp poruḷai
###Rāgā - Āṉandabairavi
###Tāḷā - Miśra cāpu
Nilaiyāp poruḷai yuḍlāk karuti
Nedunāt pozutum - Avamēpōi
Niraipōic cevidu kuruḍaip piṇigaḷ
Niraivāip porigaḷ - Tadumāri
Malanīrc cayana micaiyāp perugi
Madivēr kuriya  - Neriyāga
Maraipōr  rariya  Veḷiyāyip paravu
Malartāt kamalam - Aruḷvāyē
Kolaikāt ḍavuṇar koḍamac salati
Kuḷamāip cuvara - Mutusutam
Kuripōip piḷavu paḍamēr katavu
Kotivēr paḍaiyai - Viduvōnē
Alaivāik karaiyin magiḻcīrk kumara
Aḻiyāp punita - Vadivāgum
Aranārk katita poruḷ kāttatipa
Adiyārk keḷiya - Perumāḷē .

Eṁtaninēdelu pudurā yelāgu tāḷudura
## Anupallavī
maṁtukekku vīrava saṁtatiyāgarāja nāsā
##Svara Sāhitya
Sāraguṇabalimiganala nīrajasuma śaramulana pāramugada mimigulaga māruḍuparape śritajana
surasāla yikatāḷa nurabāla calamēlakāmāṁ takamā nitaramā kāṁtavinumā brahmādinuta
##Caraṇam 1
Tāpamadhikamā yanurā dayayuṁcuṭaku samayamidirā
##Svarasāhitya
Rārādānīdāna yīrārāpēlā sadāviraha
##Caraṇam 2
Rē pagali vādērālēma bōdhana vinakarā
##Svarasāhitya
1. Nēniraparādhurā sarāgamuna brōcuṭakunu
2. Nī suguṇamulu vinidanē nī sāmi pyamunu jēri valapumīriyidāri ninē kōritōri
##Caraṇam 3
Kōpamēra kavugilirā kōrinavaramulīrā
##Svara Sāhitya
1. Durāgatamutagadurāmaravavaladurā viṁtagayiṁta
2. Sāmrājyaphalada vinōda kṙatapāda mahitavēda karuṇarāda piluvarāda palukarādanatēṁdraśrīda
##Caraṇam 4
Śrīpuramunavelayumā śrī tyāgarāja sāmi
##Svarasāhitya
1. Svāṁtamuna galugupaṁta misūmaṁtataga daṁta kāṁtaka
2. Sārasā ramuleriginadoravani dalacitisu mā mā rumāvula balgulu mulgulu gavarala
nalasitara kalayanidi tadigadara yikanalukamā naghanamā numaumā kāṁta golicivēmā runiṭu

##Pāhi Śri
Rāgam: *Ānandabhairavi*
Tāḷam:Rūpakam
Composer: *Śyāmā Sastry*
Notation from "Śri Kṛti maṇi mālai" of Rangaramanuja iyengar
Notated by Swathi Renganath
##Lyrics
Pallavi: pāhi śri giri rāja sute karuṇā kalitē
pada sarōjam-anusarāmi tē amba
Anupallavi:dēhi matēranupama gatim mē ēkāmra pati sati sudati
tējasātulita divya mūrtē lalitē ati lalitē
Caraṇam: kāmita dhātri kamala mukhi kāmākṣi akhila sākṣi
kāma rati kāma śubha phaladē dhṛta sugandha ghana latē
śȳmē adya bhava mama mudē śyāma kṛṣṇa sad-varadē
śyāmaḷē āṣṛta ratē vidita gatē sadā iha varadē

*Tālam*:  Khanḍa jāti tripuṭa

*Mārgam*: Citratara
### Text
nī padamulē gati yani nammiti

1. First line in the book has 21 aksharas instead of 20. I changed "G R S , ," to "G R S ,"
to accommodate that, but this needs to be checked. An alternative is to change "m , , ,"

over the other. - Srikumar

# Gītam : Śyāmāśāstri
*Rāgam*: Paraju
*Tāḷam*:  Tiśra Tripuṭa
### Text
Kāmāḳsi karuṇā kaṭāḳsi kāmāḳsi lōkasāḳsiṇi
Kāmāḳsi karuṇā kaṭāḳsi kāmāḳsi mām pāhi baṅgāru
Kāmāḳsi karuṇā kaṭāḳsi kāmāḳsi mām pāhi
(1) Kāmakōṭipīṭhagatē kāmitaphaladāyikē Kāmāḳsi māmpāhi kañcikāmāḳsimāmpāhi
(2) Paṅkajadaḷalōcanē saṅkaṭabhayamōcanē śaṅkari māmpāhi śiva śaṅkari māmpāhi
(3)Śyāmākṛṣṇa pālita janani sāmagāna vinōdini śyāmaḷē mām pāhi śuka śyāmaḷē mām pāhi

### 3. Svarajati
### Rāvēmē maguva
### Rāga- Ānandabhairavi
### Tāḷa - Ādi
### Composer- Śōbhanādri
#### Ārōha - s g2 r2 g2 m1 p d2 p ṡ
#### Avarōha - ṡ n2 d2 p m1 g2 r2 s
</br>
__Pallavi__
Rāvēmē maguva vinavu tagava vēḍukanu
Karuṇa nēḍuvaga kuluka tōḍukoni
__Anupallavi__
Vēvēgamuga jani nā vimpu kanukoni
ī vādu valadani nī māṭa vinumani
__Caraṇa__
1. Ā  mānini vagalēmō celuvunikēmō
ghanamuga tōci nanu maracē
naṭanē manukonu yetanika
manambunandu nēmi tōcaganu nunḍigada
2.  Śrīkaruḍa Śōbanādri vibhuḍu nēḍa
celimkalase naṭananu
kaluvalu rājugalanu dēlcunaṭa
upāyamuna telpi tōḍukoni

full_text:
#Sami ni
Raga:- *Ānandabhairavi*
Talam:- *Aṭa*
Composer:- *Śyāmā Sāstry*
Notation from "Śri Kṛti maṇi mālai" by Rangaramanuja iyengar
Notated by Swathi Renganath
##Lyrics
Pallavi:Sāmī nī rammanavē sārasākṣi ī vēḷa
Anupallavi: Kāmuni kanna mā kāñci vāsuḍaina śri varadarājuni
Muktāyi svarasāhitya: Sarasajēri samaratula mēṭiyuparatulacē nēnaga
garima
mīraganughanamu jēyyucunu taḷirubōṇi bhalamānini vinavē  sārasa nayana ṣabhasu
varasuguṇa sāmajagamana viśalajaghana sāṭevaru dharanu nisariga nēnaṭu gāravamugala
Caraṇam: Māruni bāṇamulu vē māru
SvaraSahityam:-
1)Pāṭiyani madi calamugōni sarōja saramula sāreku ghanakucamuladhara
varāḷigamula virāḷiṅgalaga nīsukonunala
4)Māmagu nalasōmuni kākala kavari sāmindalaci niratamunu nē viraha vēdananvēsarimpa nī tarini ilāgunanu
5)Nelatalagumulu nīṭulanalari goluvagasadā madāḷulagamul karakari mrōyaganu ī rasamugā madini tā dalaci sāhasamuna
mīri ghanarōsamuna śukāḷi pikasēnalanu tādalaci mānakanu sāmōdamuna māyagoni ī samayamuna
Caraṇam Anubandham: Māruni bāṇamulu vēkūrimitō nannēlina guṇa māru nē tāḷagalēnu vantuḍaina śri varadarājuni
Sarasajēri samaratula mēṭiyuparatulacē nēnaga garima miraganughanamu jēyyucunu taḷirubōṇi bhalamānini vināvē  sārasa nayana śabhasu
varasuguṇa sāmajagmana viśalajaghana sāṭevaru dharanu sariga nēnaṭu gāravamugala

full_text:
#Sami ni
Raga:- *Ānandabhairavi*
Talam:- *Aṭa*
Composer:- *Śyāmā Sāstry*
Notation from "Śri Kṛti maṇi mālai" by Rangaramanuja iyengar
Notated by Swathi Renganath
##Lyrics
Pallavi:Sāmī nī rammanavē sārasākṣi ī vēḷa
Anupallavi: Kāmuni kanna mā kāñci vāsuḍaina śri varadarājuni
Muktāyi svarasāhitya: Sarasajēri samaratula mēṭiyuparatulacē nēnaga
garima
mīraganughanamu jēyyucunu taḷirubōṇi bhalamānini vinavē  sārasa nayana ṣabhasu
varasuguṇa sāmajagamana viśalajaghana sāṭevaru dharanu nisariga nēnaṭu gāravamugala
Caraṇam: Māruni bāṇamulu vē māru
SvaraSahityam:-
1)Pāṭiyani madi calamugōni sarōja saramula sāreku ghanakucamuladhara
varāḷigamula virāḷiṅgalaga nīsukonunala
4)Māmagu nalasōmuni kākala kavari sāmindalaci niratamunu nē viraha vēdananvēsarimpa nī tarini ilāgunanu
5)Nelatalagumulu nīṭulanalari goluvagasadā madāḷulagamul karakari mrōyaganu ī rasamugā madini tā dalaci sāhasamuna
mīri ghanarōsamuna śukāḷi pikasēnalanu tādalaci mānakanu sāmōdamuna māyagoni ī samayamuna
Caraṇam Anubandham: Māruni bāṇamulu vēkūrimitō nannēlina guṇa māru nē tāḷagalēnu vantuḍaina śri varadarājuni
Sarasajēri samaratula mēṭiyuparatulacē nēnaga garima miraganughanamu jēyyucunu taḷirubōṇi bhalamānini vināvē  sārasa nayana śabhasu
varasuguṇa sāmajagmana viśalajaghana sāṭevaru dharanu sariga nēnaṭu gāravamugala

## Varisais
Play/sing first speed once, second speed twice and
third speed four times. Note that the "Sarali" is practiced in four
speed whereas the varisais are practiced in three speeds only.
The "first/second/third" speed of the varisais correspond to the
"second/third/fourth" speeds of sarali.

#Māye maṉamkaṇindaruḷvāyē
###Rāga: Simhēndramadhyamam
###Tāḷa:  Ādi
###Composer: Kalaimāmaṇi Madurai Śrī Muralidharan
####Pallavi
##### Māyē maṉamkaṇindaruḷvāyē madurai vaḷar mīṉākṣi
#####Nīyē diṉam tiru̱ naṭaṉam purindāyē naṭarājaṉ magiẕavē
</br>
###Anupallavi
#####Tāyē kadambavaṉam taṉil udittāyē malayadhvajan magaḷām
#####Tāyē mahiṣāsura vadam purindāyē mākāḷi mahēśvari
</br>
###Muktāyi svara sāhitya
#####Akilabhuvaṉam adil uyirgaḷ taẕaittiḍavē aruḷum bhuvaṉēśvari ambā
#####Ayaṉum ariyum magiẕ araṉiṉ maṉam magiẕum umaiyavaḷē uṉai paṇindēṉ tuṇai purivāy
</br>
###Caraṇa
#####Āṉandabhairavī diṉam bāva rāga tāḷam sērndu̱ naḍai yiḍum
</br>
###Ciṭṭa svara sāhityā -s
</br>
#####1. Aṉṉai uṉṉai paṇindēṉ endaṉ tuyar kaḷaivāy
</br>
#####2. Akaramudalāṉa vaḷarmadiyai eẕil makaravār kuẕal tigaẕ oḷiyāy
#####jagamuẕudum pugaẕum guṇanidiyai diṉam aram peru̱ga diṉam taruvāy śaṅkari
</br>
#####3. Nī kalai magaḷum nī silai yeẕilum nī ulagiṉisai nī śruti layamum nī muraḷi paṇiyum tiru̱ uruvē
</br>
#####4. Ōm aim hrīm śrīm eṉum oḷiyiṉil viṇṇum maṇṇum niṟai oḷi perum sindai niṟaindavaḷē vindai purindavaḷē
#####mundaiviṉai agala kaḷaindaruḷ purivāy orumaiyuḍaṉ iruḷ agala arumaiyuḍaṉ perumaiperu̱
#####Ōḍi āḍi vāḍi nāḍi maṉdṟāḍum eṉadu̱ nilai kanḍu̱ uṉadu̱ maṉam iḷagiḍavum vaẕiyillaiyō
</br>

# Gaṇarājēna Rakṣitōham Composer: Sri Muttusvāmi Dīkṣitar Rāgam: Ārabhi Tāḷam: Misra Cāpu Pāt̤āntaram: Dr. Karaikudi S. Subramanian 
notation font size = 12
notation small font size = 10
stretch = 1.1
stretch space = 0.6
## Ārabhi tala pattern = , > Ārōhaṇam S R m P D S+ _ _ > Avarōhaṇam S+ N D P m G R S ## Lyrics ### Pallavi gaṇarājēṉa rakṣitōhaṁ guṇijaṉaṉuta pallavapadēṉa ### Samaṣti Caranam Aṇimādyaṣṭa-siddhippradēṉa Māṇikyamakuṭādidhareṇa Mantriṇi pūjita sumukhēṉa mānitaguruguha vanditēṉa Diṉakarakōṭipprakāśēṉa vinatāśritamandārēṇa Maṉupūjita pāśāṅkuśēṉa kānanasthita brahmmacaryēṇa ## Translation A prayer to Lord Ganesh. I am protected by ... One who gives all kinds of ‘siddhi-s’ including ‘aNimaa’ One who is adorned by such jewelry as diamond One who is worshiped by ‘Mantrini’ One who has a beautiful face One who is respected by ‘Guruguha’ (Lord Subrammanya) One who shines with the brightness of one crore Suns One who gives all that is wanted by the devotees One who has the ‘binding-thread’ and trident One who dwells as ‘brahmachari’ (unmarried) in a forest One who has the soft feet like flower Aṣṭa Siddhis are – Aṇima -The ability to reduce yourself to the size to the tiniest particle and turn invisible. Mahima- The ability to grow to the size of the largest thing in existence. Garima – becoming the heaviest thing in existence. Laghima -The ability to become like the lightest particle and fly. Prapti - Being in any or all places at the same time. Parakaṁya -The ability to manifest your thoughts into reality. Istva -The ability to make all act as per your wishes. Vastva -The ability to attain the absolute. ## Audio tracks **NOTE:** Audio track support is currently experimental and will undergo significant changes in presentation. Audio recordings rendered by Dr. Karaikudi S. Subramanian 1. [Text recitation][WordsTrack] 2. [Svara rendition][SvaraTrack] 3. [Vina rendition][VinaTrack] 4. [galigina dorayanucu vēdamu moraliḍa kavini](#lyrics)
[nī pavana  nilayā surasamu dayākara vidhrta kuvalayā mada](#lyrics)
[danuja vāraṇa mr̥gēndrārccita kaluśa dahana ghanā](#lyrics)
[aparimita vaibhavamugala nī smaraṇa madilō dalacina janādulaku](#lyrics)
[bahu sampadala niccēvipuḍumākabhaya miyya vē](#lyrics)
[śyāma kr̥ṣṇa sahōdari śiva śaṁkari paramēśvari ](#lyrics)
[hariharādulaku nī mahimalu gaṇimpa taramā sutuḍammā](#lyrics)
[abhimānamulēdā  nāpai](#lyrics)
[dēvī parākēlanē  brōvavē yipuḍu śrī bhairavi](#lyrics)
## Meaning
Oh Pārvati, Mother! Bhavāni! Śrī Rājarājēśvari, the nourisher of all the worlds!
The esteemed Dēvi! The lotus eyed, Pāvani! Kāmākṣi! The blemishless one! Protect me, Ambā!
You are the bestower of good fortune, Mother Mṛḍāni, of the supreme suzerain!
You are of the form of the mystic syllable "Hrīm". Your eyes are like a doe. Oh Dēvī, who
dwells in Kāñcīpura, Kāmākṣi, Śrī  Kāmēśvari,  protect me  Ambā!
You are Śāmbhavi, Janani, the ancient one, Śrī Rājarājēśvari, you are adorned with moon.
Śaṁkari Dēvi the nourisher of Śyāmakṛṣṇa. Kāmākṣi! The dark hued godess, protect me Ambā!

name: Tamizotiya
full_text:
###Tiruppugaḷ - Tamiḷōtiya
###Rāgā - Kaṉṉaḍa
###Tāḷā - Tiśra Druva
</br>
Tamiḷōtiya kuyilomayi lāṇḍalai yāpuṟavang
Kiḷikāḍaiyi ṉaṇilēraḷi yāngkural vāintatisen
Takumāmiḍa ṟeliyārita ḻāñcuḷai tēṉkaṉiyin - cuvaicērun
</br>
Tanapāramu malaiyāmeṉa vōngiḍa māmpoṟisin
Tiḍavēlviḻi nutalōcilai vāṉpirai māntuḷirin
carirārkuḻa liruḷānagai yōṅgiya vānkatirin - cuḍarpāyak
</br>
Kumiḻnāciyin  mugamōmati yānguḷir cēṅkamalañ
caritōḍiṇai ceviyāḍu  lāṅgaḷa pūṅgamugak
Koḍinūliḍai yuḍaiyārana māmpriyar māṇpurimiṉ - Koḍimātar
</br>
Kuṇamōḍama ḷiyiṉādinu mōṅgiya pūṅgamalañ
caraṇāpura kuralōsaiyu mentiḍu māṇḍalaiyiṉ
Kodiyōdeḻu taritāmvaḍi vōṅgiya pāṅgaiyumaṉ -Tagaiyēṉē
</br>
Timitōtimi timitōtimi tāṅgaṇa tīngaṇaton
Tagutōtagu tagutōtagu dānguda tīngadaton
Tigudōdimi  dimidōdimi dānguda tīntakamen - Riyalpōri
</br>
Ticaimūḍuga kadalēḻpoḍi yāmpaḍi yōṅgiyaveṅ
Karitērpari yacurārgaḷ māṇḍiḍa nīṇḍaravin
ciramīḷpaḍa kuvaḍōtugaḷ vāṉpera vāṉgiyavaṇ - Katirvēlā
</br>
Kamaḻmāvita caḍaiyāraḍi yēntuyar tīrntiḍaveṇ
Taḻalmāpoḍi yaruḷvōraḍal māṉtudi tāṅgiyavaṇ
Kararmāḍaru ḷumayāḷemai yīṉrava ḷīṉraruḷmen - Kuravōnē
</br>
Kaḍaiyēniru viṉainōimala māṇḍiḍa tīṇḍiyavoṇ
cugamōgiṉi  vaḷināyagi pāṅgaṉe  ṉāmpagarmiṉ
Kalainūludai murugāvaḻa lōṅgiya vōṅgalinvaṇ - Perumāḷē .
</br>

name: Tanta pasitanaiya
full_text:
###Tiruppugaḻ - Tanta pacitaṉaiya
###Rāgā - Mōgaṉam
###Tāḷā - Catuśra Triputa
</br>
Tanta pacitaṉaiya ṟintu mulaiyamutu
Tantu mutugutaḍa  - Viyatāyār
Tambi paṇiviḍaise̱i toṇḍar piriyamuḷa
Taṅgai marukaruyi  - Reṉavēsār
Mainta manaiviyarka ḍumpu kaḍaṉutavu
Manta varicaimoḻi - Pagarkōḍā
Vantu talainavira viḻntu taraipugama
Yaṅga vorumagiḍa  - Micaiṟi
Anta kaṉumeṉaiya ḍarntu varugaiyiṉi
Lañca leṉa valiya  - Mayilmelni
Anta maṟaliyodu kanda maṉitaṉama
Taṉpa ṉeṉamoḻiya _ varuvāyē
cintai magiḻamalai maṅgai nagliṇaigaḷ
cintu payamayilu - Mayilvīrā
Tiṅga ḷaravunati tuṉdru caḍilararuḷ
centil nagari lurai  - Perumāḷē .
</br>

full_text:
#tayakkam iṉṉum eṉṉadi
###Rāga: Rageshri
###Tāla: Ādi
###Composer: Kalaimāmaṇi Madurai Śrī Muralidharan
-------------
####Pallavi:
#####tayakkam iṉṉum eṉṉaḍi in talaivan mugam kāṇa
#####mayakkam tāṉosōllaḍi maṇam iraṇḍara kalaṉ oṉḍriyum
</br>
####Anupallavi:
#####urakkam tolaittuṉnai niṉaitthu pulambi adai uṇarvai
#####vīyakkum vaṇṇam vāzhuvōm māsillā maṉgayē ulagam
</br>
####Muktāyi Svara-Sāhitya:
#####pālnilavoḷi paṉipozhindiḍa vēlviḍiyanai vizhthi eṉvēgam
#####taṉai varutiḍa seivadai ariṉdirundumē ēn iṉṉum tāmadam
#####tēn uṇṇum vanḍenavenān uzhalvadu kaṇḍu iṉṉum
</br>
####Caraṇa:
#####kārmugil mēgamē kārkuzhalena tarittavaḷē eṉ uyirē
</br>
####Ciṭṭa Svara Sāhitya-s:
#####1.tāmarai idazhmēnikoṇḍa eṉtaḷir koḍiyē
</br>
#####2.tēnsuvai tīnkaṉi idayum miṉṉalkoḍiyai idaiyum maduḷai
#####kaṇṇagaḷum koṇduṉṉaye eṉakkiṛaivanē paḍaittānō
</br>
#####3.yēnmayil naḍaipayiṉrāi kuyil kuṛalil gītam isai pāḍi endaṉ maṉam kavarum
#####paḷingeṉamugam navarasamigum pāvayumkaram paravasamtarum kuṉi idazh nagai tanil eṉmadhi mayangidum
#####ezhpiṛaviellām seidatavamanro eṉavaḷeṉre iraivanuṉṉai eṉadeṉru taṉdanan azahge̱ eṉ vazhve̱ oḷi ākka vandavaḷe
---------------

full_text:
###Tiruppugaḻ -  Timira māmaṉa
###Rāgā - Danyāsi
###Tāḷā - Catuśra Rūpakam
</br>
Timira māmaṉa māmaḍa maḍamai yēniḍa rāṇava
Timira mēyari sūriya  - Tirilōka
Dinaka rāciva kāraṇa paṉaka Būṣhaṇa āraṇa
civacu tāvari nāraṇaṉ - marukōnē
Kumari cāmaḷai mātumai amali yāmaḷai pūraṇi
Guṇaga lāniti nārṇi - Tarukōvē
Kurugu kāguma rēcura caravaṇā cagaḷōcura
Kuṟavar māmaka ḷāsailkoḷ - Maṇiyēsam
Pamara Pārapra pāruṇa paḍala tāraka mācuka
Pacura pāḍana pāḷita - Pagaḷōca
Pacita pāraṇa vāraṇa tuvaca yēḍaga māviyil
Paravu pāṇita pāvala - Parayōga
camapa rāmata cātala camaya māriru tēvata
camaya nāyaga māmayil - Mutuvīra
cakala lōkamu māsaṟu cakala vētamu mōtoḻu
camara māpuri mēviya -  Perumāḷē .
</br>

###Tiruppugaḻ - Timira vutati
###Rāgā - Kolākalam
###Tāḷā - Catuśra triputa
</br>
Timira vutati yaṉaiya naraga
Seṉaṉa mataṉil - Viduvāyēl
Seviḍu kuruḍu vaḍivu kuṟaivu
Siṟitu miḍiyu   -  Maṇugāte
Amarar vaḍivu matiga kulamum
Aṟivu niṟaiyum - Varavēniṉ
Aṟuḷa taruḷi yeṉaiyu maṉato
Ḍaḍimai koḷavum - Varavēṇum
Samara mugave lacurar tamatu
Talaika ḷuruḷa - Migavēnīḷ
Salati yalaṟa neḍiya patalai
Tagara ayilai - Viduvōṉē
Vemara vaṇaiyi linitu tuyilum
Vizigaḷ naḷinaṉ - Marukōṉē
Miḍaṟu kariyar kumara paḻani
Viravu mamrar  - Perumāḷē .
</br>

full_text:
###Tiruppugaḻ - Tōlelumbu Sīnarambu
###Rāgā - civakāmboji
###Tāḷā - Catuśra Triputa
</br>
Tōlelumbu sīnrambu pīḷaituṉdru kōzaipoṅgu
Sēripiṇḍa māyuruṇdu - Vadivāṉa
Tūlapaṅga kāyamvampi lēsumantu nāṉmelintu
Sōruminta nōyagaṉṟu  - Tuyarāra
Ālamuṇḍa kōṉakaṇḍa lōkamuṇḍa mālviriñcan
Āraṉṅga ḷāgamaṅgaḷ - Pugaḻtāḷum
Āṉaṉaṅgaḷ mūviraṇdu māriraṇdu tōḷumaṅgai
Yāḍalveṉri vēlumeṉṛu - Niṉaivēṉē
Vāḻacandra  cūdicanta vētamantra rupiyampai
Vāṇipañca pāṇitanta  - Murugōṉē.
Mayaiyaintu vēgamaintu pūtamaintu nātamaintu
Vāḻperuñca rāsaraṅga - Ḷuraivōṉē
Vēlayuṉpu kūravanta ēkatanta yāṉaikaṇdu
Vēḍarmaṅgai yōdiyañca - Aṇaivōṉē
Vīramaṅgai vārimaṅgai pāriṉmaṅgai mēvugiṉṟa
Mērumaṅgai yāḷavanta - Perumāḷē .
</br>

full_text:
#Umā Mahēshwari
##Raga : Rēvathi
##Composer : Kalaimāmaṇi Madurai Śrī Muralidharan
---------
</br>
##Pallavi:
### umā mahēshwari ulaga nāyaki udaṉ vandharuḷ tharuvāi shaṅkari krupākari
### simmāsaṉam ēṟi bavaṉivarum ṣruṅgāra rōpiṇi sivagāmi sidhaikavar nadaṉam seidhidum sundari
</br>
##Anupallavi:
### semmāmalar mugam koṇda mahā tripurasundari bhaṇdāsuraṉai vadham seidhu aruḷ thandhāi
### ammā ādhināyaki azhagumigu ambikē aṉalthaṉil oru padam thookiyē arum thavam seidhāi
</br>
##Muktayi Svara-Sāhitya:
### ādhi andhamum illādhavaḷe āyiram kaṇṇōdu aruḷpavalē
### ādhavaṉiṉ oḷimaṇdalam amarndha adhisaya sugam tharum akhilāṇdēshwari
</br>
##Charanam:
### rāja rājeshwari rāga thāḷa bhāvamōdu ādal seyyum
</br>
##Chittai Svara-Sāhitya:
### 1) seṅkarumbai thaṉ kai endhi maṅgaḷam thandhidum
### 2) maragatha maṇimagudam maṉam kavarndhida aruḷum māthaṅgi māyavaṉiṉ sōdhari nee maṉam kaṉindharuḷ purindhidum thrishūlini
### 3) varuvāi vaḷamura vazhiyiṉai udan tharuvāi ulagil uyirgaḷ uyarvura
### dhayaipurivāye tharuṇam idhuvē thāmadham iṉṉum eṉamma
### vaṇṇa māmayil thanil varum murugaṉum vārana mugaṉum vaṇaṅgidum thāye
### māmadurai arasāḷum meenākshi muralidharaṉiṉ maṉam vāzhum
--------------

full_text:
#உமா மஹேஸ்வரி
##ராகம் : ரேவதி
##தாளம் : ஆதி
---------
</ப்ர்>
##பல்லவி:
### உமா மஹேஸ்வரி உலக நாயகி உடன் வந்தருள் தருவாய் சங்கரி க்ருபாகரி
### சிம்மாசனம் ஏறி பவனிவரும் ஷ்ருங்கார ரூபிணி சிவகாமி சிந்தைகவர் நடனம் செய்திடும் சுந்தரி
</ப்ர்>
##அனுபல்லவி:
### செம்மாமலர் முகம் கொண்ட மஹா த்ரிபுரசுந்தரி பண்டாசுரனை வதம் செய்து அருள் தந்தாய்
### அம்மா ஆதிநாயகி அழகு மிகு அம்பிகே அனல் தனில் ஒரு பதம் தூக்கியே அரும் தவம் செய்தாய்
</ப்ர்>
##முக்தாயி ஸ்வர-ஸாஹித்யம்:
### ஆதி அந்தமும் இல்லாதவளே ஆயிரம் கண்ணோடு அருள்பவளே
### ஆதவனின் ஒளிமண்டலம் அமர்ந்த அதிசய சுகம் தரும் அகிலாண்டேஸ்வரி
</ப்ர்>
##சரணம்:
### ராஜ ராஜேஸ்வரி ராக தாள பாவமோடு ஆடல் செய்யும்
</ப்ர்>
##சிட்டை ஸ்வர-ஸாஹித்யம்:
### 1) செங்கரும்பை தன் கை ஏந்தி மங்களம் தந்திடும்
### 2) மரகத மணிமகுடம் மனம் கவர்ந்திட அருளும் மாதங்கி மாயவனின் சோதரி நீ மனம் கனிந்தருள் புரிந்திடும் த்ரிஷுலினி
### 3) வருவாய் வளமுர வழியினை உடன் தருவாய் உலகில் உயிர்கள் உயர்வுர
### தயைபுரிவாயே தருணம் இதுவே தாமதம் இன்னும் ஏனம்மா
### வண்ண மாமயில் தனில் வரும் முருகனும் வாரண முகனும் வணங்கிடும் தாயே
### மாமதுரை அரசாளும் மீனாக்ஷி முரளிதரனின் மனம் வாழும்
--------------

full_text:
% Vaddanevaru leru
-------------
file name = Tyagaraja Swamy - Shanmukha priya - Vaddanevaru Leru
-------------
<script src="http://sriku.org/lib/carnot/carnot.min.js"> </script>
## Composer: Sri Tyagaraja Swamy
## Rāgam: Shanmukha priya, 56th Mela
## Tāḷam: Adi
## Version: Vidushi Sowmya
## Meaning:
O Emblellishment of the heart of this tyAgarAja!
There is none to console me.
Though I am ever crying to behold Your mirror-like face, there is none to notice and console me.
You are the God who knows the bent of my mind which has absolutely no demand either in this World or for Heaven; aren’t You?
There is none other than You to console me.
##        Aa: S R2 G2 M2 P D1 N2 S
## Av: S N2 D1 P M2 G2 R2 S

# Aruṇōdayamē
*Composer:* Sri Lalgudi G. Jayaraman
*Ragam:* Bauḷi
*Talam:* Ādi
*Patantaram:* Sri Lalgudi G. Jayaraman
## Lyrics
aruṇōdayamē aṉbiṉ vaḍivamē
aṉṉayē niṉ padam eṉṟum paṇivōm
arumaṟaigaḷ pōṟṟum ādi śakti nī
aṉbarellām vāḻa āḷum dayāpari
karuṇai deivam nīye, kāttaruḷē
அருணோதயமே அன்பின் வடிவமே
அன்னையே நின் பதம் என்றும் பணிவோம்
அருமறைகள் போற்றும் ஆதி சக்தி நீ
அன்பரெல்லாம் வாழ ஆளும் தயாபரி
கருணை தெய்வம் நீயே காத்தருளே

# Bahudāri varṇam by Lalgudi G. Jayaraman
*Composer*: Lalgudi G. Jayaraman
*Ragam*: Bahudāri
*Talam*: Ādi
*Patantaram*: Lalgudi G. Jayaraman
*Notation*: Dr. Karaikudi S. Subramanian
**Note**: Needs a second eye.
## Lyrics
entō prēmatōnu ninnē kōriti
ēmō daya rāvalē nā sāmi
centa  jēri na cita lella dirca
panta mela śrī  vaḷḷi kānta
tāmasamē latā jāla
## Pallavi

# Varṇam: Aṇṇalin - Kalyāṇa Vasantam - Ādi
*Ragam:*  Kalyāṇa Vasantam
*Talam:* Ādi
*Composer:* Unknown
### Arohanam
tala pattern = ,
aksharas = 6
S g m d N S+
### Avarohanam
tala pattern = ,
aksharas = 8
S+ N d P m g R S
## Lyrics
### Pallavi
aṇṇaliṉ āṇai yēndi
aṉṉai jānakiyait tēḍi
alai kaḍal kaḍandāi aṉṟē
aṉjaṉait tavap pudalva
### Anupallavi
aśōka vanamaḻittāy - akśaṉai
angē māyttāy
ilangaiyai kaḍin derindāy
iḍargaḷaik kaḷain derindāy
ittaṉai seyal purindum
iṟumāppē illai yāṉay
ettanai ēttiṉalum
aiyā! niṉ nigarumuṇḍō
### Caranam
oppilā valimai peṟṟay!
ōduvōm undaṉ nāmam.

# Varṇam: "padaredi" - Yadukulakambhoji - Aṭa tāḷam - Patnam Subramaṇya Iyer *Composer*: Patnam Subramaṇya Iyer *Talam*: Khaṇḍa jāti aṭa tāḷam *Ragam*: Yadukulakambhoji Notated as learnt from Karaikudi. Lakshmi Ammal, my Grandmother 
notation font size = 12
notation small font size = 10
stretch = 3.0
stretch space = 0.7

#Varṇam: Saurāṣṭram - Nāmanavini
*Rāgam* : Saurāṣṭram
*Tāḷam:* Caturaśra jāti aṭa tāḷam
*Composer:* Śyāmā śāstri
### Ārōhaṇam -     S r G m P m D N S
### Avarōhaṇam -    S N D n D P m G r S
## Lyrics
*Pallavi:*  Nā manavini vinu ī vēḷa brōvu kānci kāmākṣammā
pāmarapālini ō jananī kṛpa jūḍavammā
*Anupallavi:*  Nemmadini nī nāmamē dikkani ninu nammitinammā māyammā
*Ciṭṭasvara sahityam:*  pādakamalayugamulapai gatiyanina
ī sannidhini vaccina dāsuna nannu canavuna rakṣincuṭaku parula
ī dharalō telisi aparādhamulanu manninci nīvu mā duritamu dīrccipuḍu dayajūci
nā manavini ninu ī vēḷa brōvu kāñci kāmākṣammā
*Caraṇam:* Bhaktuḍaina nāpai inta vādā māyammā muktinīyavē
śyāmakṛṣṇa nuta amba

# Varṇam: Svāmi nān unran aḍimai - nāṭṭakuriñji - Ādi
*Rāgam:* nāṭṭakuriñji
*Tālam:* Ādi
*Composer:* Pāpanāsa sivan
## Lyrics
*Pallavi:*  Svāmi nān unran aḍimai enru ulakamelāṁ ariyumē
tāmataṁ sheyyātu vantar̥ul mātōr paṅkā pūtēsā
*Anupallavi:*  nāmāṁr̥uta pānamē en jīvanamē enru naṁpinēnē
naṭanamāṭuṁ shēvaṭi tarisanamenrnru kiṭaikkumennavē ēṅkinnēnnē
*Cittaisvaram:* ceñjaṭā ṭaviyil iḷaṁpirai deyva kaṅkaiyuṁ ōraravu māṭa iḷanakai tavamuṁ sevvitaḻuṭaṉ tatīṁ eṉa citraṁpalam tanilāṭuṁ
*Caranam:* naṭarājā dēvā saccitā ānanta
*Carana svara sāhityaṁ̇ 1:* āḍum nin alakil kādal koṇṭa ivaḷaippār
*Carana svara sāhityaṁ 2:* nandhi bhrṅki siva kaṇam munnivarkalumlum intiran mutalamara kōṭikaḷ paṇiyuṁ
*Carana svara sāhityaṁ 3:* punnakait taval itaḻiṉ aḻakaiyuṁ kaṭaik kaṇnalakaiyuṁ kaṇṭāl mazhuppaṭaiyai señcaṭaiyai tōlluṭaiyai madakaja naṭaiyai ninainturukuṁ ivaḷai āṇṭarul
*Carana svara sāhityaṁ 4:* nī varantara uṭan viraintu vara meyyaṉpu koṇṭu ninaintu nāḷ muḻutuṁ tan ninaivīlāḷ kaṇ uraṅkilaḷ uṇavar̥ntilaḷ tir̥ppeyarai sollisollipulaṁpuvaḷ tanimaitanilē kalakalavena nakaittiṭumivaḷin virakaṁ taniya aruḷ nī puriyāviṭilē mōcaṁ varuṁ pācamuṭan vantar̥ḷ

# Varṇam: Svāmi nāṉ uṉraṉ aṭimai - Nāṭṭakuṟiñci nāṭṭakuriñji - Ādi
*Ragam:* nāṭṭakuṟiñji

## Lyrics
*Pallavi:*  Svāmi nāṉ uṉraṉ aṭimai eṉṟu ulakamelāṁ ariyumē

naṭaṉamāṭuṁ chēvaṭi taricaṉameṉṟu kiṭaikkumeṉavē ēṅkiṉēṉē
*Cittaisvaram:* ceñjaṭā ṭaviyil iḷaṁpirai deyva kaṅkaiyuṁ ōraravu māṭa iḷanakai tavamuṁ cevvitaḻuṭaṉ tatīṁ eṉa ciṟṟaṁpalantaṉilāṭuṁ
*Caranam:* naṭarājā dēvā saccitāṉantācaccitānanta
*Carana svara sāhityaṁsahityaṁ 1:* āḍum niṉ aḻakil kādal koṇṭa ivaḷaippār

*Carana svara sāhityaṁsahityaṁ 3:* puṉnakait tavaḻl itaḻiṉ aḻakaiyuṁ kaṭaik kaṇṇaḻakaiyuṁkaṇṇaḻakaiyuṁ kaṇṭāṉ maḻuppaṭaiyai ceñcaṭaiyai tōluṭaiyai matakaja naṭaiyai niṉaintur̥kuṁ ivaḷai āṇṭar̥ḷ
*Carana svara sāhityaṁsahityaṁ 4:* nī varantara uṭaṉ viraintu vara meyyaṉpu koṇṭu koṇṭu niṉaintu nāḷ muḻutuṁ taṉ niṉaivīlāḷ kaṇ uṟaṅkilaḷ uṇavar̥ntilaḷ tir̥ppeyarai collicollipulaṁpuvaḷ taṉimaitaṉilē kalakalaveṉa nakaittiṭumivaḷiṉ virakaṁ taṉiya aruḷ nī puriyāviṭilē mōcaṁ varuṁ pācamuṭaṉ vantar̥ḷ

# Varṇam: Vanajākśi - Kalyāṇi - Ādi
*Ragam:*  Kalyāṇi
*Talam:* Ādi
*Composer:* Rāmanāthapuram Śrīnivāsa Iyengār
## Lyrics
*Pallavi:*  vanajākśirō ī viraha mōrvana vāsudēvuni dōḍi dēvē
*Anupallavi:*  vinavē nāgapuramuṉa velayu saundara rājuṉi
*Caranam:* nilupa rāṉi mōhamāyē
## Pallavi

full_text:
###Tiruppugaḻ - Vindadinūri
###Rāgā - Kānaḍā
###Tāḷā - Miśra cāpu
</br>
####Sāhityam
Vindadi nūri vandhadhu kāyam
Vendhadhu kōḍi yinimēlō -
Viṇḍuviḍāma lunpada mēvu
Viñjai yarpōla aḍiyēnum ;
</br>
Vandhuvi nāsa munkali tīra
Vaṇci vañana vaḍivādi -
Vanpadamēri yenkaḷaiyāra
Vandharuḷ pāda malartāri ;
</br>
Endanuḷēka señcuḍa rāgi
yen kaṇilāḍu taḻalvēṇi -
Endhai yarthēḍu manparsa gāya
reṅgaḷ svāmi yaruḷbālā ;
</br>
Sundara gñāna menkuramādu
Tanriru mārbi laṇaivōnē -
Sundaramāna sendi lilmēvu
Kandha surēsar perumāḷē .

name: bodhi virundhu tiruoougaz
full_text:
###Tiruppugaḻ - Bōdhi virundhu
###Rāgā - Bhavapriyā
###Tāḷā - Aṅgatāḷam
</br>
####Sāhityam
Bōdhi virundhu viḍāccatur vēdhamo ḻindhava nārpuḷi
nāgamu kandhava naṛṛeri varidāna -
Pōtuyar sendhaḻa lāpperu vānani raindhavi ḍāppuga
ḻaḷana ruñjiva kīrtthiya nerikāṇa ;
</br>
Ādāra vinparuḷ mākkuru nādane  umpaḍi poṛṛiḍa
Ānapa aṅgaḷai nākkaru diḍavēyen -
Āsaiye ṇumpaḍi meṛkavi pāḍumi dambala pārṭṭaḍi
yēnuma ṛindhunai yēṭṭuva dorunāḷē ;
</br>
Kādiḍa rumpaḍi pōippala pūsali ḍuṅkaya lāṛkani
vāyida ḻincuvai yaṛpayil kuramādiin -
Kāraḍa ruṅkuḻa lāṛkiri yānada naṅkani nāṛkalai
mēvuma ruṅkada nāṛceri kuḻai yōḻai ;
</br>
Sādana menṛurai yāppari tāpame numpaku vāiṭṭaḍu
māṛima nandhaḷa rāṭṭani tirivōnē -
Sāgara manṛeri yāḳḳoḍu sūraru kumpaḍi yāṭṭiṇi
Vēlaiyu rampeṛa voỵṭiya perumāḷē .

##Sahitya ###Pallavi dāsana mādiko enna swāmi sāsira nāmada venkaṭa ramaṇā ###Charana (1) durubuddhigaḷanella biḍisō ninna karuṇakavachavenna haraṇake toḍisọ charaṇasēvē enage koḍisō abhaya kara pushpavennaya shiradalli muḍisō ###Charana (2) dhruḍa bhakti ninnali bēḍi nā adigeraguvennaiya anudina paḍi kaḍegennalekena nōḍi beḍuve koḍu ninna dhyānava manashuchi māḍi ###Charana (3) morehokkavara kāiva birudu enna mareyade rakshaṇe māḍaiya poredu duritagaḷellava taridu siri purandaraviṭhala ennanu poredu ## #kriti: Saurāṣṭram - Nāmanavini
*Rāgam*  Saurāṣṭram
*Tāḷam:* Caturaśra jāti aṭa tāḷam
*Composer:* Śyāmā śāstri
### Ārōhaṇam -     S r g m p m d n s
### Avarōhaṇam -    S n d n d p m g r s
## Lyrics
*Pallavi:*  Nā manavini vinu ī vēḷa brōvu kānci kāmākṣammā
pāmarapālini ō jananī kṛpa jūḍavammā
*Anupallavi:*  Nemmadini nī nāmamē dikkani ninu nammitinammā māyammā
*Ciṭṭasvara sahityam:*  pādakamalayugamulapai gatiyanina
ī sannidhini vaccina dāsuna nannuu canavuna rakṣincuṭaku parula
ī dharalō telisi aparādhamulanu manninci nīvu mā duritamu dīrccipuḍu dayajūci
nā manavini ninu ī vēḷa brōvu kānci kāmākṣammā
*Caraṇam:* Bhaktuḍaina nāpai inta vādā māyammā muktinīyavē
śyāmakṛṣṇa nuta amba

Nidiyēnit tiyamēyen ninaivēnaṛ poruḷāyōi ;
Kadiyēsoṛ paravēḷē karuvūriṛ perumāḷē
</br>

name: marukkulaviya tiruppugaz
full_text:
### Tiruppugaḻ - Marukulāviya
###Rāgā - Kuntalavarāḷi
###Tāḷā - catuśra maṭyam
</br>
####Sāhityam
Maruku lāviya malaraṇai kodiyādē -
Vaḷarṭṭa tāitamar vasaiyadu moḻiyādē ;
</br>
Karuku lāviya ayalavar paḻiyādē -
Kaḍappa mālaiyai yiniivara viḍavēṇum ;
</br>
Taruku lāviya koḍiyiḍai maavāḷā -
Samarṭṭa nemaṇi mragada mayilvīrā ;
</br>
Tiruku rāvaḍi niḻaltani luraivōnē -
Tirukkai vēlvaḍi vaḻagiya peruma̱ḷē .

name: muthaitharu truppugaz
full_text:
###Tiruppugaḻ - Muthaitharu
###Rāgā - Hamsadwani
###Tāḷā - tiśra tr̤puṭa
</br>
####Sāhityam
Muthaitharu patthit thirunagai
Athikkirai satthic caravaṇa
Mutthikkoru vitthuk kurupara enavōdum -
Mutjatpara markuc curuthiyin
Murpaṭṭadu karpitt thiruvaru
Muppatthumu varkkat thamararum - aḍipēṇa ;
</br>
Patthutthalai thatthak kaṇaithodu
Orraikkiri matthaip porutoru
Paṭṭappagal vaṭtat tigiriyil iravāga -
Patthar kiratatthaik kaḍaviya
Paccaipppuyal meccat taguporuḷ
Pakṣatthodu rakṣit taruḷvadhum orunāḷē ;
</br>
Thitthittheya votthap paripura
nṛttappadam vaitthup payiravi
Thikkotka naḍikkak kaḻuukoḍu kaḻudhāḍa -
Thikkkupparii aṭtap payiravar
Thokkuthogu thokkut thoguthogu
Cittrap pavurikkut tṛggaḍaga enavōda ;
</br>
Kotthupparai kkoṭṭak kaḷamisai
kukkukkugu kukkuk kugukugu
Kuttip pugaipukkup piḍiyena mudukūgai -
Kotputreḻa natpatra vuṇarai
vettippali yittuk kulagiri
Kutthuppaḍa otthup poravala perumāḷē

Nīdānet thanaiyālum - nīḍūḻik kṛpaiyāgi;

Vēdāmait thunavēḷē - vīrāsar guṇasīlā;
Ādārat thoḷiyānē - ārūrir perumāḷē;
</br>

#கநவு காந்பாஇ
###ராக : ந்ஆக்ஆநந்திநி
###தாள : ஆதி
-------------
####பல்லவி:
####கநவு காந்பாஇ எந் தொஜ்ஹா உந்நை
####உரந்காமலும் எந்த்ரும் ஸெயல் வீரநாக்கும்
####நிநைவில் நீந்காநல் மநிதந் இவந்
####எந்த்ரு-உலகெல்லாம் புகஜ்ஹ உயர்ந்திட எந்ட்ரும்
</br>
####அநுபல்லவி:
####மநதில் எந்ட்ரெந்ட்ரும் தளரா முயர்சியை முந்வேஇத்து
####எரிந்திடும் கொஜ்ஹுந்தாஇ ஏஜ்ஹுந்திடு
####எண்ணந்கள் ஓயாமல் எதுத்த காரியம் யாவிலும் வெந்ட்ரிட
####உஜ்ஹைப்பாஇ நந்பநெ
</br>
####முக்த்āயி ஸ்வர-ஸ்āஹித்ய:
####பொந்நாக உந் கந்நாஅக உந் நேரத்திநை நீ போத்ரிடு
####ஒவ்வொரு நொடியும் வாஜ்ஹ்வில் அரிதெந உநர்ந்தால் நந்ட்ரு கால
####நேரம் போந பிந் எண்ணி வாதும் மநிதர்கள் எந்ட்ருவை வெந்ட்ரதில்லை
</br>
####சரṇஅம்:
####வாநமும் வளைத்திதலாம் வையகமெல்லஅம் வெல்லலஅம்
####முயர்சியால்
</br>
####சிṭṭஅ ஸ்வர ஸ்āஹித்ய-ஸ்:
####1. ஸிந்திடும் வெயர்வை துளிகள் ஒவ்வொந்ட்ரும் ஒருக்காவியம்
####படைத்திட பாதை நீ வாஜ்ஹ்வில் வகுத்திடு
</br>
####2. ஸிந்திப்பவை எல்லாம் உந் ஸுய ஸிந்தநை எந்ரிருப்பட நந்மையெந
####உருதியுடந் ஸெயல் பட நீ உஜ்ஹைத்திடுவ̣இ
</br>
####3. நெந்ஜத்தில் அந்ஜாமை கொந்டெந்ரும் வாஜ்ஹ்வில்வரும் ஸோதநை எல்லாம் நீ தகர்திடு வேதநை எல்லாம் ஒடிட வஜ்ஹ்ந்திது
####துந்ஜாமல் துஇமை உள்லதிநில் நேர்மையொடு எதிர்வரும் தடை எளிதிநில் உடை புதிர்களிந் விடை புரிந்திட நீ உஜ்ஹை
####ஸொல்லில் வாஇமை ஸெயலில் மேண்மை வேந்டும் பாந்மநை இடை மநம் பதித்திடு திநம் ஸேஇதிடும் தோஜ்ஹிலிநை தெஇவமாஇ நிநைத்தவர்
####வெந்ட்ரார் உலகில் நிந்ரார் மாயை அரிவுரை ஸொல்வது ஸுலபமே அதந்
####வஜ்ஹி நிந்ட்ரு தாந் ஏந்ரும் வெந்ரிடல் கடிநம் எந்ரபோதும் நீ
---------------

full_text:
###Tiruppugaḻ - Nālu maindu
###Rāgā - Tōḍi
###Tāḷā - Ticiram
</br>
Nālu maindu vāsal kīṟu tūṟuḍampu kālgaiyāgi
Nāri yeṉpi lāgu māga - Mataṉuḍē
Nāta  meṉdra ādi vāyil nāḍaṅga ḷāṉa āḍi
Nāḍa ṟinthi ḍāma lēka - vaḷarāmun
Nūla nanta kōḍi tēḍi māl migintu pāruḷōrai
Nūru ceñcol kūri māri - Viḷaitīmai
Nōi kalanta vāḻvu ṟumal nīkalantu ḷāguñāṉa
Nūla ḍaṅga vōta vāḻvu - Taruvāyē
Kālaṉ vantu pāla ṉāvi kāyaveṉṟu pāsamvīcu
Kālam vantu vōla mōla - Meṉumāti
Kāma ṉaintu pāṇa mōdu vēmiṉeṉdru kāṇmōṉar
Kāḷa kaṇḍa rōdu vēda - Moḻivōnē
Āla monṟu vēlai yāgi yāṉai yañal tīrumūlai
Āḻi yaṅgai āyaṉ māyaṉ - Marukōṉē
Āra ṇaṅgaḷ tāḷai nāḍa vāra ṇaṅgai mēvumāti
Yāṉa centil  vaḻva tāṉa - Perumāḷē .
</br>

# Varṇam: Svāmi nāṉ uṉraṉ aṭimai - Nāṭṭakuṟiñci nāṭṭakuriñji - Ādi
*Ragam:* nāṭṭakuṟiñji
*Talam:* Ādi
*Composer:* Pāpanāsa sivaṉ
## Lyrics
*Pallavi:*  Svāmi nāṉ uṉraṉ aṭimai eṉṟu ulakamelāṁ ariyumē
tāmataṁ ceyyātu vantar̥l mātōr paṅkā pūtēcā
*Anupallavi:*  nāmāṁr̥ta pāṉamē eṉ jīvaṉamē eṉṟu naṁpiṉēṉē
naṭaṉamāṭuṁ chēvaṭi taricaṉameṉṟu kiṭaikkumeṉavē ēṅkiṉēṉē
*Cittaisvaram:* ceñjaṭā ṭaviyil iḷaṁpirai deyva kaṅkaiyuṁ ōraravu māṭa iḷanakai tavamuṁ cevvitaḻuṭaṉ tatīṁ eṉa ciṟṟaṁpalantaṉilāṭuṁ
*Caranam:* naṭarājā dēvā saccitāṉantācaccitānanta
*Carana svara sāhityaṁsahityaṁ 1:* āḍum niṉ aḻakil kādal koṇṭa ivaḷaippār
*Carana svara sāhityaṁsahityaṁ 2:* nandhi pr̥ṅki civa kaṇam muṉivarkal̥ṁ intiraṉ mutalamara kōṭikaḷ paṇiyuṁ
*Carana svara sāhityaṁsahityaṁ 3:* puṉnakait tavaḻl itaḻiṉ aḻakaiyuṁ kaṭaik kaṇṇaḻakaiyuṁkaṇṇaḻakaiyuṁ kaṇṭāṉ maḻuppaṭaiyai ceñcaṭaiyai tōluṭaiyai matakaja naṭaiyai niṉaintur̥kuṁ ivaḷai āṇṭar̥ḷ
*Carana svara sāhityaṁsahityaṁ 4:* nī varantara uṭaṉ viraintu vara meyyaṉpu koṇṭu koṇṭu niṉaintu nāḷ muḻutuṁ taṉ niṉaivīlāḷ kaṇ uṟaṅkilaḷ uṇavar̥ntilaḷ tir̥ppeyarai collicollipulaṁpuvaḷ taṉimaitaṉilē kalakalaveṉa nakaittiṭumivaḷiṉ virakaṁ taṉiya aruḷ nī puriyāviṭilē mōcaṁ varuṁ pācamuṭaṉ vantar̥ḷ

name: nilavini leyiruntu
full_text:
###Tiruppugaḻ - Nilavini leyiruntu
###Rāgā - Kāṉaḍā
###Tāḷā - Ticira Rūpakam
</br>
Nilavini leyiruntu vagaimala rēterintu
Niṟai kuḻal Mītaṇintu - Kuḻaitāvum
Nigaraṟu vēliṉagaḷ varitara vācagaṅgaḷ
Niṉaivara vēmo ḻintu - Mataṉuliṉ
Kalapama ṉōga raṅga ḷaḷavara vēpurintu
Kaṉiyita ḻēya runti - Yanurāgak
kalaviyi lēmu yaṅgi vaṉitaiyar pālma yaṅgu
Kapaḍnai yāḷa vuṉdra - ṉaruḷkūrāi
Ulagamo rēḻu maṇḍa  rulagamu mīsartaṅgu
Muyargayi lāya mumpoṉ - Varatāṉum
Uyireḍu Būta maintu morumutalāgi niṉdṟa
Umaiyaruḷāl vaḷrnta - Kumarēcā
Kulaipaḍu sūra ṉaṅga maḻipaḍa vēle ṟinta
kumaraga ḍōra veṅkaṇ - Mayilvīrā
Koḍumuḍi yāiva ḷarntu puyaṉilai mītuyarnta
Gurumalai mīta marnta - Perumāḷē .
</br>

#kriti: Saurāṣṭram - Nāmanavini
*Rāgam*  Saurāṣṭram
*Tāḷam:* Caturaśra jāti aṭa tāḷam
*Composer:* Śyāmā śāstri
### Ārōhaṇam -     S r g m p m d n s
### Avarōhaṇam -    S n d n d p m g r s
## Lyrics
*Pallavi:*  Nā manavini vinu ī vēḷa brōvu kānci kāmākṣammā
pāmarapālini ō jananī kṛpa jūḍavammā
*Anupallavi:*  Nemmadini nī nāmamē dikkani ninu nammitinammā māyammā
*Ciṭṭasvara sahityam:*  pādakamalayugamulapai gatiyanina
ī sannidhini vaccina dāsuna nannuu canavuna rakṣincuṭaku parula
ī dharalō telisi aparādhamulanu manninci nīvu mā duritamu dīrccipuḍu dayajūci
nā manavini ninu ī vēḷa brōvu kānci kāmākṣammā
*Caraṇam:* Bhaktuḍaina nāpai inta vādā māyammā muktinīyavē
śyāmakṛṣṇa nuta amba

full_text:
###Tiruppugaḻ - Nirāmaya purātaṉa
### Rāgā - Danyāsi
###Tāḷā - Catuśra  Triputa kanḍagati
</br>
Nirāmaya purātaṉa parāpara  varāmruta
Nirākula cirātikap  - Prapaiyāgi
Nirācaci varājata varājargaḷ parāviya
Nirāyuta purāriyac - cutanvētā
curālaya tarātala curācara pirāṇigaḷ
Sorūpami varātiyaik - Kuṟiyāmē
Turālpugaḻ parātiṉa karāvuḷa parāmuka
Turōgarai tarācauyur - ṟaḍaivēnā
irāgava irāmaṉmuṉ irāvaṇa irāvaṇa
irāvaṇa irājaṉutt  -  kuḍanmāiveṉ
Rirājgaṉma larāṇija purāṇrku marākalai
irājaco lavāraṇrrk - Kilaiyōnē
Virāgava curātipa porātuta virātaḍu
Virā yaṇa parāyaṇc  - ceruvūrā
Virāviya kurāvakil parāraimu tirāvaḷar
Virālimalai rājatap - Perumāḷe
</br>

full_text:
###Tiruppugaḻ - Ñāla meṅgum
###Rāgā - Rītigouḷai
###Tāḷā -Miśra Jampai
Ñāla mengum vaḷaita raṟṟu   -   Kaḍalāle
Nāḷum vañi yaṟṟu raikkum  -   Vacaiyāle
Āla mugantu matita ḻaṟkum   -   Aḻiyāte
Āṟi raṇdu puyanta ṇaikka    -   Varuvāye
Kōla meṉdru kuratti yaitta    -  ḻuvumārpā
Kōḍai yampati yuṟṟu niṟku   - Mayilvīrā
Kāla nañca varaitato ḷaitta -  Mutalvāṉōr
Kālvi laṅgu kaḷaitta ṟittta -  Perumāḷē .

name: paalaai nulaai tiruppugaz
full_text:
###Tiruppugaḻ - Pālāi nūlāi
###Rāga - Mōhanam
###Tāḷa - catuśra tṛpuṭa
</br>
###Sāhityam
Pālāi nūlāi thēnāi nīnāi
Pāgāi vāisor koḍiyārtām -
</br>
Pāḍā vāḍā veḍā vālē
Pāḍā yīḍar  riḍaipīrun ;
</br>
Tōlā lēkā lālē yūnā
lēsūḻ pāsak kudilmāsu -
</br>
Tōyā māyā vōyā nōyāl
Sōrvāi māḷak kadavēnē ;
</br>
Gñālā mēlā vēdā bōdā
nādā sōdik kiriyōnē -
</br>
Gñānā sārā vānāḷ kōnē
nānā vēdap poruḷōnē ;
</br>
Vēlā bālā sīlā kārā
vēḷē vēḍak koḍikōvē -
</br>
Vīrā tārā ārā tārā
vīrā vīrap perumāḷē

name: paalo theno tiruppugaz
full_text:
###Tiruppugaḻ - pālō thēnō
###Rāgā - Madyamāvati
###Tāḷā - catuśra tṛpuṭa
</br>
####Sāhityam
Pālō thēnō  palavuru suḷaiyadu
tānō vānōr amudukol kaḻairasa
Pāgō vunō ḍuruguya maganuṇa varuṇgñānap -
Pālō vērō moḻiyena aḍukoḍu
Vēlō kōlō viḻiyena mugamadu
Pānō vānūr nilavuko lenamagaṇ magiḻvēnai ;
</br>
Nālām rūpā kamalaśaṇ mugavoḷi
yēyō mādōm enadagam  vaḷaroḷi
Nānē nīyō paḍikamo ḍoḷiriḍa madusōdi -
Nāḍō Vīḍō naḍumoḻi yenanaḍu
Tūṇēr tōḷā suramuga kanagasabai
nādā tātā enavuru giḍaAruḷ purivāyē ;
</br>
Māllāi vānōr malarmaḻai poḻiyava
Tārā sūrā enamuni vargaḷpugaḻ
Māyā rūpā aragara sivasiva enavōdā -
Vādā ḍūrā ḍavuṇaro ḍalaikaḍal
Kōkō kōkō enamalai veḍipaḍa
Vāḷal vēlāl maḍivusei daruḷiya murugōnē ;
</br>
Sūlāḷ mālaḷ malarmagaḷ kalaimagaḷ
Ōdār sīrāḷ kadirmadi kulaviya
Tōḍāḷ kōḍā riṇaimulai kumarimun arulbālā
Tūyā rāyār idusuga sivapada
Vāḻvā mīnē vadivame nuṇarvoḍu
Sūḻsī rārūr maruviya imaiyavar perumāḷē .

full_text:
###Tiruppugaḻ - paḍarpuviyin
###Rāgā - Nīlāmbari
###Tāḷā - Ēkam
</br>
###Sāhityam -
Paḍarpuviyin mīdu mīri vañjargaḷ
Viyaniyurai pānuvāivi yandurai
Paṭuthilperu sīla nūlga ḷuntheri   -   saṅgapāḍal
</br>
Panuvalkadhai kāvya māmē ṇeṇkalai
Tiruvaḷuva dēvar vāimai yengira
Paḻamoḻiyai yōdiyēyu ṇarndhupal  -  sandamālai
</br>
Maḍalbaraṇi kōvai yārka lambaka
Mudaluḷadu kōḍi kōḷpṛa bandhamum
Vagaivagaiyi lāsu sērpe ruṅkavi  -  caṇḍavāyu
</br>
Madurakavi rāsa nunen veṇkuḍai
Virudukōḍi taḷa mēḷa daṇḍikai
Varisaiyo ḍulāvu māla kandaita -  virndiḍādō
</br>
Aḍalporudu pūsa lēvi ḷaindhiḍa
Edirporavo ṇama lēka saṅkara
Aragarasivā magāde venruni  -  anrusēvit
</br>
Tavanivegu kāla māiva ṇaṅgiyu
ḷurugivegu pāsa kōsa sampṛama
Adipela kaḍōra māsa landara  -  nenduvīḻa
</br>
Uḍaltaḍiyu māḻi tāve nampuya
Malargaḷdasa nūru tāḷi ḍumpaga
lorumalari lādu kōva ṇiindhiḍu   -  seṅkaṇmāluk
</br>
kudhaviyama kēsar bāla indiran
Magaḷaimaṇa mēvi vīru senthilil
Uriya-adiyēnai yāḷa vandharu  -  tambirānē
</br>

Pagaliravinir raḍumāra padiguruvenat theḷibōdha

Igaparamadar kiṛaiyōnē iyalisayinirmut tamiḻōnē
Sagasiragirip padivēnē saravaṇabhavap perumāḷē
</br>

full_text:
###Tiruppugaḻ -  Paniyin vindhuḷi
###Rāgā - Harikāmbōdhi
###Tāḷā - Khaṇḍa dṛvam
####Sahithyam
Paniyin vindhuḷi pōlavē karuvinuru
Manavilaṅgoru sūsamāi miḷagu thuvar
Panaithenaṅkani pōlavē pala kaniyin vayirugip -
</br>
Paruvamundalai kīṭatāi naṭuvi nila
Maruvi yonbadu vāsalsē ruruvamuḷa
Padumai yinseyal pōlavē vaḷikayiri nuḍanuḍi ;
</br>
Manavidanderi yāmalē mala saalamo
ḍuḍalna garndhaṭu tāriyē anaimulaiyin
Mayama yinroru pālanā yigamuḍaiya seyalmēvi -
</br>
Vaḍiva munseidha thīmaiyā leyumunaiyum
Aram randhaga mīdupōi anudinamu
mana maḻinduḍal nārinē niniyunadu kaṯaltārāi ;
</br>
Tanana tantana tānanā tanatanana
Tinana tintana tītathō tigutatigu
taguta kuntati tāgutō venamuḻavu vaḷaiperi -
</br>
Tavilka ṇamparai kāḷamō ḍimilētoni
yinamu ḻaṅkeḻu vēlaipō ladiraporu
Samarmu kaṅkaḷin mēviyē virudusolu mouṇērgaḷ ;
</br>
Sinama ṯindida tērkaḷtō lariparigaḷ
Kurudi yeṇḍisai mūḍavē alagainari
Siraiyi naṅgaḷi kūravē nagaiyaruḷi viḍujmvēlā -
</br>
Sivanma giṯndaru ḷānaimā muganmaruvi
Manama giḻndaruḷ kūravōr kayilaimagiḻ
Tigaḻku riñjiyin mādumāl maruvupugaḻ perumāḷē
</br>

name: parimala kanaba
full_text:
###Tiruppugaḻ - Parimaḷa Kanaba
###Rāgā - Nāṭtakuriñji
###Tāḷa - catuśra aṭa
</br>
####Sāhityam -
Parimaḷa kaḷabasu gandhac candhat tanamānār -
Paḍaiyama paḍaiyena vañjiḳkuṅkat kaḍaiyālē;
Variyaḷi niraimural koṅguḳ kaṅkuṛ kuḻalālē -
Marukiḍu maruḷanai yinpur ranpur raruḷvāyē;
Arithiru marugaka ḍambat toṅgar rirumārbā -
Alaikumu kumuvena vembak kaṇdittheri vēlā ;
Thiripura thaganarum vandhik kuñjar gurunādā -
Seyaseya harahara sendhir kandhap perumālē
</br>

###Tiruppugaḻ - Patthiyāl yānunai
###Rāgā - Bēgaḍā
###Tāḷā - Khaṇḍa jhampa
</br>
####Sāhityam
Patthiyāl yānunaip palakālum -
Parriyē māthirup pugaḻpāḍi ;
</br>
Mutthanā mārenaip peruvāḻvin -
Mutthuyē sērvadar karuḷvāyē ;
</br>
Utthamā tānasar guṇarnēyā -
Oppilā māmaṇik kirivāsā ;
</br>
Vitthagā gñānasat tinipādā -
Verri vēlāyudap perumāḷē .
</br>

###Tāḷā - Tiśra jhampa
</br>

Pumiyadanir prabhuvāna -
Pugaliyilvit thagarpōla ;
</br>
Amirtagavit toḍaipāḍa -
Aḍimaitanak karuḷvāyē
</br>
Samariledirt tasurmāḷat -
Taniyayilvit taruḷvōnē ;
</br>
Nmasivayap poruḷānē -
Rasatagirip perumālē .

#கந்வில்̤இ ம்ūḍஇ செந்த்ர்ஆந்
###ர்ஆக: க்ஆபி
###த்ஆல: ஆதி
-------------
####பல்லவி:
####கந்வில்̤இ ம்ūḍஇ செந்த்ர்āந் கருவṇṇஅந் கமலகṇṇஅந் எந்தந்
####விṇṇஅயும் மṇṇஅயும் தந் வாயிநில் காட்டியெ விந்தை ஸெஇத மாயவந்
</br>
####அநுபல்லவி:
####எந்நுள்ளம் திருடி செந்த்ரெ தந் வஸம் வைத்தாந் எளநம் ஶெஇதெந்நை ஏந்கவே வெஇக்கிராந்
####பெண்நிவள் மநதிநில் இந்நலை தந்தே ஸெந்த்ராநே எந்நிலை அவநரியாரோ தோஜ்ஹி
</br>
####முக்த்āயி ஸ்வர-ஸ்āஹித்ய:
####மயிட்டஜ்ஹகிய விஜ்ஹிகள் ஏந்க மலரிட்டஜ்ஹகிய கோந்தல் விரிய
####மெய்யுட்ட்ருகிய உள்ளம் உருக இந்நுட்ட்ரவந் இந்கு வருவாநோ
####மய்யல் கொந்டு-இவள் வாதுவதை பெஇயும் மாமுகில் நிரவண்நந்
####புரியாதவநா அரியாதவநா மநிவண்ணந் அவந்
</br>
####சரṇஅம்:
####காலை இளம் ஸுரியநாஇ காலி அவந் நேரில் வர மயக்கம் பிரக்கும்
####கந்நந் அவந் கரம் கோர்து கலிப்புடந் ஆடிடவே
</br>
####சிṭṭஅ ஸ்வர ஸ்āஹித்ய-ஸ்:
####1. பொந்நுடை அது மிந்நிட குலிர் நரு ஸந்தநம் மணக்க மநத்துல் நிரைந்திடுவாந்
####இநிக்க இநிக்க மொஜ்ஹிந்திடுவாந் பநிக்கும் இதஜ்ஹ்கள் மலரவே
</br>
####2. தேந் ஊரும் தீந்சுவயாம் இதஜ்ஹில் ஊந் உருகும் உயிர் உருகும் குஜ்ஹலால்
####வாந் உருக நாந் உருக ஏந்தி இஸைப்பாந் இநிமயுடநே தந் வஸத்தால் எஜ்ஹுத்திடுவாந் உள்ளம் நிரைப்பாந் இளமை மிக
</br>
####3.
</br>

name: seethamma mayamma
orig_seq: 
full_text:
Gaṇarājēna Rakṣitōham
Composer: Sri Muttusvāmi Dīkṣitar
Rāgam: Ārabhi
Tāḷam: Misra Cāpu
Pāt̤āntaram: Dr. Karaikudi S. Subramanian
Ārabhi
Ārōhaṇam
S
R
m
P
D
S
Avarōhaṇam
S
N
D
P
m
G
R
S
Lyrics
Pallavi
gaṇarājēṉa rakṣitōhaṁ guṇijaṉaṉuta pallavapadēṉa
Samaṣti Caranam
Aṇimādyaṣṭa-siddhippradēṉa Māṇikyamakuṭādidhareṇa
Mantriṇi pūjita sumukhēṉa mānitaguruguha vanditēṉa
Diṉakarakōṭipprakāśēṉa vinatāśritamandārēṇa
Maṉupūjita pāśāṅkuśēṉa kānanasthita brahmmacaryēṇa
Translation
A prayer to Lord Ganesh.
I am protected by ...
One who gives all kinds of ‘siddhi-s’ including ‘aNimaa’
One who is adorned by such jewelry as diamond
One who is worshiped by ‘Mantrini’
One who has a beautiful face
One who is respected by ‘Guruguha’ (Lord Subrammanya)
One who shines with the brightness of one crore Suns
One who gives all that is wanted by the devotees
One who has the ‘binding-thread’ and trident
One who dwells as ‘brahmachari’ (unmarried) in a forest
One who has the soft feet like flower
Aṣṭa Siddhis are –
Aṇima -The ability to reduce yourself to the size to the tiniest particle and turn invisible.
Mahima- The ability to grow to the size of the largest thing in existence.
Garima – becoming the heaviest thing in existence.
Laghima -The ability to become like the lightest particle and fly.
Prapti - Being in any or all places at the same time.
Parakaṁya -The ability to manifest your thoughts into reality.
Istva -The ability to make all act as per your wishes.
Vastva -The ability to attain the absolute.
Audio tracks

name: sruti maraiga
full_text:
###Tiruppugaḻ - cruti maraiga
###Rāgā - Jaṉarañjaṉi
###Tāḷā - Tiśra Druva
</br>
cruti maraiga ḷirunālu tisaiyi latipar muṉivōrgaḷ
Tugaḷi liruḍi yeḻu pērgal  - cuḍarmūvar
Solavil muḍivil mukiyāta pagutipuruḍar navanātar
Tolaivi luḍuvi ṉulakōrgal  - Maṟaiyōrgaḷ
Ariya camaya morukōḍi amarar caraṇar catakōḍi
Ariyu mayaṉu morukōḍi  - Yivarkūḍi
Aṟiya aṟiya aṟiyāta aḍigaḷaṟiya aḍiyēnum
Aṟivu  ḷaṟivu maṟivūra - Aruḷvāyē
Varaigal taviḍu poḍiyāga nirutar patiyu maḻivāga
Magara salati aḷaṟuga - Mutucūrum
Maḍiya alagai naḍamāḍa vijaya vaṉitai magiḻvāga
Mavuli citaṟi iraitēḍi - Varunāigaḷ
Narigaḷ  koḍigaḷ paciyāṟa utira natiga ḷalaimōta
Namaṉum veruvi yaḍipēṇa  - Mayilēri
Naḷiṉa vupaya karavēlai muḍukumuruga vaḍamēru
Nagari yuraiyu mimaiyōrgaḷ - Perumāḷē .
</br>

# Varṇam: Svāmi nān unran aḍimai - nāṭṭakuriñji - Ādi
*Rāgam:* nāṭṭakuriñji
*Tālam:* Ādi
*Composer:* Pāpanāsa sivan
## Lyrics
*Pallavi:*  Svāmi nān unran aḍimai enru ulakamelāṁ ariyumē
tāmataṁ sheyyātu vantar̥ul mātōr paṅkā pūtēsā
*Anupallavi:*  nāmāṁr̥uta pānamē en jīvanamē enru naṁpinēnē
naṭanamāṭuṁ shēvaṭi tarisanamenrnru kiṭaikkumennavē ēṅkinnēnnē
*Cittaisvaram:* ceñjaṭā ṭaviyil iḷaṁpirai deyva kaṅkaiyuṁ ōraravu māṭa iḷanakai tavamuṁ sevvitaḻuṭaṉ tatīṁ eṉa citraṁpalam tanilāṭuṁ
*Caranam:* naṭarājā dēvā saccitā ānanta
*Carana svara sāhityaṁ̇ 1:* āḍum nin alakil kādal koṇṭa ivaḷaippār
*Carana svara sāhityaṁ 2:* nandhi bhrṅki siva kaṇam munnivarkalumlum intiran mutalamara kōṭikaḷ paṇiyuṁ
*Carana svara sāhityaṁ 3:* punnakait taval itaḻiṉ aḻakaiyuṁ kaṭaik kaṇnalakaiyuṁ kaṇṭāl mazhuppaṭaiyai señcaṭaiyai tōlluṭaiyai madakaja naṭaiyai ninainturukuṁ ivaḷai āṇṭarul
*Carana svara sāhityaṁ 4:* nī varantara uṭan viraintu vara meyyaṉpu koṇṭu ninaintu nāḷ muḻutuṁ tan ninaivīlāḷ kaṇ uraṅkilaḷ uṇavar̥ntilaḷ tir̥ppeyarai sollisollipulaṁpuvaḷ tanimaitanilē kalakalavena nakaittiṭumivaḷin virakaṁ taniya aruḷ nī puriyāviṭilē mōcaṁ varuṁ pācamuṭan vantar̥ḷ

name: tarayin mAnuda
full_text:
###Tiruppugaḻ - Tarayin māṉuḍa
###Rāgā - Nīlāmbari
###Tāḷā - Catuśra triputa
</br>
Tarayiṉ māṉuḍa rācaiyi ṉulmaḍa
Leḻutu mālarul mātargaḷ tōtaga
caracar māmala rotiyi ṉuliru  - Koṅgaiyālun
</br>
Taḷarmi ṉeriḍai yāluḍai yālnaḍai
Yaḻagi ṉulmoḻi yālviḻi yālmarul
cavalai nāyaḍi yenmika vāḍima - Yaṅgalāmō
</br>
Paṟavai yānameiñ ñāṉigal mōṉigal
Aṇuko ṇāvagai nīḍumi rāciya
Pavaṉa pūraka rēcaka māgiya -  Vintunātam
</br>
Pagarō ṇātatu  cēravo ṇātatu
Ṉinaiyo ṇātatu vāṉata yābara
Pathiya tānaca māthima ṉōlayam - Vantutārāi
</br>
Siṟaivi ḍātani cācarar cēṉaigaḷ
Maḍiya nīlaka lāpama tēṟiya
Tiṟalvi nōtaca mēḷata yābara - Amburācith
</br>
Tiraigal pōlalai mōtiya cītala
Kuḍaga kāviri nīḷalai cuḍiya
Tirisi rāmalai mēlurai vīragu - Ṟiñcivāzum
</br>
Maṟavar nāyaka ātivi nāyakar
Iḷaiya nāyaka Kāviri nāyaka
Vaḍivi nāyaka āṉaita Nāyaka - Eṅgaḷmāṉiṉ
</br>
Magiḻu nāyaka dēvargaḷ nāyaka
kavuri nāyaka nārguru nāyaka
Vaḍiva tāmalai yāvaiyu mēviya - Tambiraṉē
</br>

name: tirunila maruvik
full_text:
###Tiruppugaḻ -  Tirunila maruvik
###Rāgā - Hamacānandi
###Tāḷā - Calamaḍḍiyam
</br>
Tirunila maruvik kāli ṉiruvaḻi  yaḍaipaḍḍōḍi
civavaḻi yudaṉur ṟēga  - Paramītē
civasuḍa rataṉaipp pāvai  maṇameṉa maruvikkōla
Tiripura  meriyat tīyil  - Nagaimēvi
iruviṉai poriyakkōla tiruvaru luruvat tēki
Yruḷgati rlipor būmi - Tavacūde
iruvaru murukik kāya nilaiyeṉa maruvith tēva
Riḷaiya ṉeṉavith tāra - Maruḷvāyē
Paripura kaḻaleḍḍācai cevidugaḷ paḍmuth tēvar
Paḻamarai paṇiyac cūla - Maḻumānum
Parivōḍu suḻalac cēḍan muḍineru neanakkōvu
Pariyiṉai malarviḍāḍi - Aḍyōrgaḷ
Araharā vurukiccēcē yenatiru naḍaṉak  kōla
maruḷseyu  mumaiyirbāga - Aruḷpālā
Alaraṇi kuḻalpor pāvai tirumaga ḷmaḷippōrō
Ḍaḍiyavar kayilaik kāṉa  Perumāḷē .
</br>

name: truvinil nadava
full_text:
###Tiruppugaḻ - Teruviṉil naḍavā
###Rāgā- yadukula kāmbōti
###Tāḷā- Catuśra duruvam
</br>
Teruviṉil naḍavā maḍavār
Tiraṇdō ṟukkum - Vacaiyālē
Dinakara ṉeṉavē laiyilē
civantu tikkum - Mathiyālē
Pōrucilai vaḷaiyā eḷaiyā
Mataṉto ḍukkum - Kaṇaiyālē
Puḷa kita mulaiyā ḷlaiyā
Mañcalittu      - Viḍalāmō
Orumalai yirukū reḻavē
Yurampu kuttum  - Vaḍivēlā
Oḷivaḷār tiruvē ragamē
Yugantu niṟkum - Murugōnē
Arumaṟai tamiḻnū laḍaivē
Terintu raikkum - Pulavonē
Ariyayari pirama tiyarkāl
Vilaṅga viḻkkum - Perumāḷē
</br>

name: vanjamkondu tiruppugaz
full_text:
###Tiruppugaḻ - Vañjaṅkoṇḍu
###Rāgā - Bilahari
###Tāḷā - tiśra tṛpuṭa
</br>
####Sāhityam
Vañjãkoṇ ḍundhiḍa rāvaṇa
numpandhena tiṇpari tērkari
Mañjinpaṇ puñjari yāmena vegusēnai -
Vandhampum poṅgiya tāgae
dhirndhuntan sampira dāyamum
Vambundhum bumpala pēsiyu medirēgai
</br>
Miñjendruñ caṇḍaisei pōdugu
raṅgundhuñ junkanal pōlave
guṇḍundhuṅkun ruṅkara ḍārmara madumvīsi -
Miṇḍundhuṅ kaṅkaḷi nāneda
karndhaṅkaṅ kaṅkara mārpoḍu
Miñjandhuñ jintini sāsararvagaisēra
</br>
Vuṇcaaṇan tenrisai nāvaḍi
ḻundhankuñ cenrama tūdaegaḷ
Undhundhun tenriḍa vēdasai niṇamuḷai
Uṇḍuṅkaṇ ḍuñsila kūḷigal
ḍiṇḍiṇḍen ruṅkudi pōḍavu
yarndhampuṅ koṇḍuvel mādavan marugōnē
</br>
Tañjantañ janciri yēnmadi
koñjaṅ koñjanturai yēyaruḷ
Tandhenrin pandharu vīḍadhu taruvāyē -
Saṅgaṅkañ saṅkayal suḻtaḍam
Eṅgeṅgum poṅgama kāpuni
daṅtaṅkuñ sendilil vāḻvuyar perumāḷē .
</br>

###Tiruppugaḻ - Varadāmaṇi
###Rāgā - Dēvamanōhari
###Tāḷā - Catuśra tṛpuṭa
</br>
####Sāhityam
Varadā maṇinī yenavōril
Varugā dedudā nadilvārā
Tiradā tigaḷāl navalōgam
Iḍavē kariyā midilēdu
Saradā maraiyō tayanmālum
Sakalā gamanū lariyāda
Paradē vadaiyāḷ tarusēyē
Paḻani purivāḻ perumāḷē .

name: variyaar karunkan tiruppugaz
full_text:
###Tiruppugaḻ - Variyār karuṅkaṇ
###Rāgā - Kamalāpdapriya
###Tāḷā - catuśra tṛpuṭa
</br>
####Sāhityam
Variyār karuṅkaṇ maḍamādar -
Magavāsai tonda maduvāgi ;
</br>
Irupōdu naindhu meliyādē -
Irutāḷi nanpu taruvāyē ;
</br>
Paripālanañ sei daruḷvōnē -
Paramēsu ranra naruḷpālā ;
</br>
Arikēsa vanran marugōnē -
Alaivā yamarndha perumāḷē .
</br>

full_text:
# 2. Varṇam
##"Svāmi nān unṛan aḍimai"
*Rāgam:* Nāṭṭakuriñji
*Tālam:* Ādi
*Compōser:* Pāpanāsa sivan
## Lyrics
*Pallavi:*  Svāmi nān unṛan aḍimai enṛu ulagamellām aṛiyumē
tāmadam seyyādu vandaruḷ mādōr paṅgā būdēsā
*Anupallavi:*  nāmāmr̥da pānamē en jīvanamē enṛu nambinēnē
naṭanamāḍum sēvaḍi darisanamenru kiḍaikkumenavē ēṅginēnē
*Muktāyi svara:* ceñjaḍā ḍaviyil iḷampirai deiva kaṅgaiyum ōraravumāḍa
iḷanagai  tavazuñ sevvidazuḍan tadīm ena ciṭrambaḷan tanilāḍum
*Caraṇa:* naṭarājā dēvā saccidā ānanda
*Caraṇa svara sāhitya 1:* āḍum nin azagil kādal koṇḍa ivaḷaippār
*Caraṇa svara sāhitya 2:* nandi bṛṅgi siva ghaṇam munivaṛgalum indiran mudalamara kōṭikaḷ paṇiyum
*Caraṇa svara sāhitya 3:* puṇnakait tavaz idazin azagaiyum kadaik kaṇnazakaiyum kaṇdāl mazuppaḍaiyai
ceñjaḍaiyai tōluḍaiyai madakaja naḍaiyai ninaindurugum ivaḷai āṇḍarul
*Caraṇa svara sāhitya 4:* nī varantara uḍan virainḍ va meiyanbu koṇḍu ninaindu nāḷ muzudum tan ninaivilāḷ kaṇ uraṅgilaḷ uṇavar̥ndilaḷ
tiruppeyarai sollisollipulambuvaḷ tanimaitanilē kalakalavena nakaittiḍumivaḷin viragam taṇiya aruḷ nī puriyāviḍilē mōsam varum pāsamuḍan vantaruḷ

name: varuga veettenum tiruppugaz
full_text:
###Tiruppugaḻ - Varuga vīttenum
###Rāgā - Tōḍi
###Tāḷā - Raṅgatyōdam
</br>
####Sāhityam
Varuga vīttenum virakar nētthiram
Vāḷō vēlō sēlō mānē enumādar -
Manadu pōrkaru kinaku vārkkuḻal
Vānē kānē māyā māyōn vaḍivēyō ;
</br>
Parugu pārkadal murugu tēkkiya
Pālō thēnē pāgō vānē ramudēyō -
Pavaḷa vāip peni moḻiya nākkavi
Pāḍā nāyē nīdē tudē yoḻivēnē ;
</br>
Arugu pārppadi yurugi nōkkavō
rālkīḻ vāḻvār vāḻvē kōkō enaēki -
Avuṇar kūppiḍa vudadi thīppaḍa
Āgā sūrā pōgā tēmī ḷenavōḍik ;
</br>
Kurugu pērkkiri yuruva vōcciya
Kūrvē lālē yōrvā ḷālē amarāḍik -
Kulica pārtthipa nulagu kāttharuḷ
Kōvē dēvē vēḷē vānēr perumāḷē .

name: vasanamigavetri tiiruppugaz
full_text:
###Tiruppugaṯ - Vasanamigavērri
###Rāgā - Kuntalavarāḷi
###Tāḷā - Ādi
</br>
####Sahityam
Vasanamiga vērri maravādē -
Manadutuya rārri luṯalādē ;
</br>
Isaipayil saadākṣa ramatālē -
Igapara saubākya maruḷvāyē ;
</br>
Pasupati sivākya muṇarvōnē -
Paṯanimalai vīrra ruḷumvēlā ;
</br>
Asurarkiḷai vāṭṭi migavāṯa -
Amararsirai mīṭṭa perumāḷē .
